description: This application contains many of the works of Leonardo da Vinci carefully cataloged. The main screen provides a quick view of the categories accompanied by an explanatory image and title (if the title is not entirely visible you can touch the image of the category to make it slide). Long touch the image of the category to diplay the gallery with all the thumbnails. Touching a thumbnail will open the enlarged work and you can navigate in current section using the gallery below. You can perform various actions on the work currently displayed using the buttons at the bottom. Using the buttons: 1. Back arrow: Back to previous view 2. Four arrows: Displays the current work in full screen (you can choose the external program of your choice. Example Gallery) 4. Phone Icon: Set as Background currently displayed work (will be displayed a dialog box for confirm) Thanks

Application receives new images automatically from a variety of sources and notifies you of new pictures worthy of your attention. You draw the track as the car drives! Scribble Scram is a car driving game that is funny, entertaining and addictive. The style is of kids crayon drawings, making it colorful, crazy and charming. Choose between the boy character of Scribble Scram Dan or the girl character of Scribble Scram Jan. Journey through the kindergarten artwork which includes: - Your family portrait including your dogs. - Sharks, whales and Nemo - style clown fish. - Alien invasion on Planet Mars. - Monster from under the bed! If you think this game is only for kids, think again. It will test your concentration and steadiness of hand as you draw the path on which the car drives. Collect cupcakes along the way as bonuses. Most importantly, don't fall off the track or wreck your car! This game was created using libLOL - "The Lehigh Overlay for LibGDX" This game is free and therefore contains ads. However, ads can be removed for 0.99 USD. By downloading this application you are agreeing to StudyHall Entertainment LLC's End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy which can be found at: http://studyhallentertainment.com/end-user-license-agreement--eula-.html http://studyhallentertainment.com/privacy-policy.html

A full featured, fully customizable digital clock and weather forecast widget The widget features the following: - 3 widget sizes, 4x1, 4x2 and 5x2 - Flip animation - Several widget skins to choose from - Different weather icon skins - Different fonts for the time - Display the next alarm and week number on the widget (optional) - Several widget hotspots (most of them can be user defined to launch specific applications) - Automatic location (from cell/wifi or GPS) or manual - Automatic weather update interval (15 min, 30 min, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8 hours) or manual - Hour change notification option - Detailed current weather forecast display that includes the following: - Local time (for current location) - Sunrise and sunset time for current location - Humidity, pressure, chance of rain, dew point, visibility, UV index and wind conditions - Current condition, temperature, low and high temperatures - Last weather update time - Background according to the weather condition and day/night - Optional display of the current moon phase - 24 hourly weather forecast - 24 hourly wind forecast - 7 day future forecast - Future forecast details (sunrise, sunset, moon phase, wind, humidity and chance of rain - World weather: Choose to display weather information for any number of different locations worldwide The application is localized in the following languages: Afrikaans, ‎العربية‎, български, Català, 中文 (简体), 中文 (繁體), Hrvatski, Čeština, Dansk, Nederlands, Suomi, Français, Deutsch, Ελληνικά, , ‎עברית‎, Magyar, Bahasa Indonesia, Italiano, 한국어, Lietuvių, македонски, Norsk, Polski, Português (Brazil), Português (Portugal), Română, русский, Српски (Ћирилица), Srpski (Latinica), Slovenčina, Slovenščina, Español (Spain), Svenska, ไทย, Türkçe, Українська, Tiếng Việt Please report any problems, suggestions or requests via e-mail

Khmer <> English Dictionary offline and free. You can search both English and Khmer words. You can search words directly from "Internet Browser" or other Applications by using Sharing option. In the sharing option you will find "Khmer Dictionary" and choosing "Khmer Dictionary" will open the dictionary with the shared word so you need not type. Exiting from the dictionary will return you to "Internet Browser" or other Applications again. This is not only a Dictionary but also a learning tool. You can use this dictionary when you have no Internet connection. MCQ (Multiple Choice Question) option is available. There is autosuggestion so you need not type full words. You also can use Speech to text feature. You can add words to the study plan and remove words from the study plan. When you start typing, you will see some words starting with the letters you typed. The dictionary searches in a database for the matching words. This can slow down typing in small handsets. Therefore in settings there is an option to turn that off. So low profile mobile handsets can turn off Auto search to type quickly. You will see a Dictionary icon on the notification bar to start the app quickly. On sharing text you will find the Khmer Dictionary. This will be helpful to find out the meaning of any word. Features of the Dictionary: • Khmer To English • English To Khmer • No internet connection required • Search From Web • Search by Sharing • Auto Suggestion • Pronounce & Voice Search • Antonyms (Opposite words) • Synonyms • Backup and Restore • History & Study Plan • Word Game • Share Words • Copy Words
release_text: • Voice search bug fixed • Auto language detection re-enabled • Word of the day added (Up to 5 words in a day) • New words added • Antonyms added • You can remove Banner Ad to get full screen for content by choosing Ad type. • Khmer Speaking added (If device support). • Khmer transliteration added. • Now you can backup study plan, history and added words in a file and restore on any device using that file. • New background added

THE BIER APP – ESPECIALLY FOR PEOPLE THAT LOVE CRAFT BEER! Get a recommendation on which craft beer you should drink in a pub. Search for similar beers that are related to the beers that you like. Are you not in your hometown? No problem, with the BierApp you can easily find craft beer in the best pubs in the Netherlands Functions in the BierApp: - A list of all associated pubs - A personal book of your own ratings you have given in the past - Per beer a description of the taste and their background information - All the information you need from the pub such as the visiting hours and contact details - An extended beerdatabase.. growing every day. - The latest news or events of your favourite pub - And lots, lots more... SO WITH THE BIERAPP YOU NEVER HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT NOT FINDING AN INTERESTING NEW CRAFT BEER!

How to use : 1. Click 'Levels' button to select solution you want. 2. View and read the solution. 3. Press 'Back' arrow button on your phone to select another level.

Pacific Navy Fighter - Commander Edition Fight three of the major sea battles of WW2 pacific. Fly the Avenger, Corsair and Hellcat (or Zero, Kate and Judy for I.J.N.) while commanding recon, patrol and strike flights to their destination from multiple carriers. Action packed you'll be jumping from cockpit to cockpit to save the day. Fly in formation as a bomber or protective fighter escort, fly recon to spot enemy fleets so you can order strike flights at them specifying aircraft and weapon types for bombers and escorts. The fight is on in generated single missions and in three historic major battles: - Battle of Santa Cruz - Battle of Eastern Solomons - Battle of Midway Make strategic decisions about flights depending on weapons and planes left on the carriers, consider flight times and weigh your options over defensive and offensive action. 3 seconds later you are looking around from the cockpit again: enough with the radio, lets jump another set of enemies! Consider the weather and visibility, and don't expect daytime to last forever as night, dusk and dawn will challenge your orientation, navigation and situation awareness skills. Just when you think your done you'll be faced with landing on a carrier mid-storm in bad visibility. Having survived the whole ordeal, did you do well enough to earn a medal?

description: Even if you want to eat cupcakes cute bogiman to put your smart phone~ "★ Apply the theme to transform your background screen, icon and launcher widget! :D ■ How to apply a theme - Install dodol launcher (if you haven't yet). - Press the home button and set the dodol launcher as the default home launcher by selecting [Use as default value for this task] or [Always]. - Open the launcher menu by swiping the home screen upwards, select the [Theme] menu, then select and apply the theme of your choice.

High quality baby flash cards with optional voice playback of all the words! This app is designed to help young children (and even babies) learn basic words in a fun and engaging way. The app contains over 170 fun cartoon flash cards divided into 10 categories (Animals, Food, Body, On the Go, Around the House, Colors, Alphabet, Shapes, Outside, Instruments). Each flash card includes a high quality cartoon image and text displaying the word. There is also an optional clear audio recording speaking the word available for purchase within the app. While flipping through the pictures and playing with the voice, your child will be learning and having fun at the same time. *NOTE: to increase the volume of the voice use your device's volume up button (probably the same as your ringer volume button) while the voice is playing. It should say "Media Volume" instead of "Ringer Volume". Features: * High quality images (over 170) * Simple to use (child simply "swipes" to reveal the next card) * Ten flashcard categories * Option to customize categories displayed * Shuffle mode * Voice playback of all the words available additionally within the app

Play this wedding game with 3 girls getting married in Las Vegas. The three brides are looking for beautiful bridal make-up and the best hairdo. The guys are getting their hair fixed. Of course you will try to find a bouquet for them! Both grooms are stylish in suits and want their shoes to shine. You can decorate the background with fitting items, like balloons and a big wedding cake. Post the best wedding picture on your Facebook! description: Mobile monitoring control panel for Express GSM. The Express GSM Mobile Monitoring Control Panel is a reliable, easy to install and use software utility that will remotely manage and monitor multiple locations utilizing Express GSM motion detectors, Polus GSM door/window sensor, Dip GSM smoke sensor, Polus GSM Aqua water level detector, Polus GSM Thermo temperature range sensor operating via a GSM channel. Olena Shypilova presents the free course “Nederlands in 7 Lessons” for RUSSIAN speakers, an application that will help you bring your Nederlands skills to a level of comfortable communication on basic topics! Application developed by the site http://speakasap.com . Tailored to beginners, this course is simple, logical, structured and short. The course includes only Basic Nederlands grammar, the type of grammar used most by people all over the world for everyday communication in Nederlands. Every lesson is offered in audio format: we provide understandable explanations that make it easy for you to listen to our course anytime on the go. All the exercises address a specific topic with useful and common vocabulary. All answers are provided in audio format. In contrast to typical exercises where you simply click on the correct translation of a word or the correct verb form, leading to boredom and the inability to think on your own, we composed our exercises in a different way. In our exercises you translate the whole sentence at once. You can always check your answers. You will find 80% of all words used in the exercises either in the lesson materials or in previous exercises, so it’s not necessary to consult a dictionary all the time. Moreover, memorizing new words comes with practice, especially when you construct phrases or sentences without assistance. Features: • Full version of the free course “Nederlands in 7 Lessons” • Interactive exercises for assessing your knowledge and teaching the material • Audio materials with the explanations of the lessons and exercises • Video materials with the explanations of the lessons (requires an internet connection) • Easily access speakASAP online • Quickly get in touch with the Support service • All materials (except video materials) are stored on your electronic device and available without an internet connection Join our groups: http://vk.com/speakASAP http://www.facebook.com/speakASAP http://twitter.com/speakASAP http://blog.speakasap.com Join our YouTube Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/eustudy We will be happy to receive any comments and propositions from you. Write us at mobile@speakasap.com Install! Test it! Let us know about bugs! Study with pleasure! For additional information refer to our site http://speakasap.com/ru/nederlands-in-7-lessons The course’s founder Olena Shypilova and the speakASAP team.

With sophisticated pedestrian navigation you can walk comfortably and safely to your destination. Make sure also of the many useful features that the AutoNavi Premium package offers. Try it out for yourself, because from the first use of the app, you can test the package for 7 days free of charge in its entirety! With the following additional functions and packages that you can easily purchase via in-app, customize the app to your needs: Car Navi Package: + 2D Vehicle Navigation + HERE maps of Austria + POI on the map + Extended Destination Information + Traffic Check: Get already before departure information on the current traffic conditions in your area + Reality View Light + Precise voice announcements + Automatic day / night mode, the map display + Clever Parking + Weather Live + Bluetooth support (Android 2.2) + Extended Pedestrian Navigation + Local Search Car Navi Premium Package: All functions of car navigation package to expand: + Europe Maps 44 + 3D Navigation (bird view) + Reality View Pro - Photo-realistic preview of motorway junctions + NAVIGON MyRoutes - display multiple routes including an estimate of the travel time to choose + Text-to-Speech - Spoken street names + Speed ​​Assistant - displays the speed limit and warns in case of need + Lane Assistant Pro - helps correct filing before reaching a junction + Active Lane Assistant (Android 2.2) - animated lane guidance based on the current speed + Radar Info (permanently installed equipment) Google Street View (where available) Upgrade package With the upgrade package you as a user of the car navigation package. Always have the possibility to extend the application to all the extra features of the Premium package Traffic Live Package + Supplied regularly and in real time with the latest traffic information NAVIGON cockpit + Offers a wealth of statistics and information for your driving behavior, which are also displayed on the screen NAVIGON FreshMaps XL + Through time payment you will receive at least two years, every three months, the latest maps from the experts. These include EU 44 maps. Panorama View 3D + Shows you the landscape not as a flat image, but in three dimensions with mountains and valleys for even better orientation. By on-board navigation there are no data charges or roaming charges, for example Route calculation and map display. IMPORTANT NOTES: - NAVIGON guide by Drei can be only be used by Drei Austria customers with an according SIM card - For first time users: This software requires more data (maps, etc.) which must be loaded via WLAN. - When using Live services such as Traffic Live will need a data connection may apply for according to your mobile contract fees. - It requires about 1GB of free space. Please ensure that sufficient storage (SD card) is available. - Samsung users: please only download maps via WLAN! During the first use of NAVIGON guide by Drei registers your software. This happens automatically and requires a small amount of data from ca.25kB. Depending on your wireless service plan fees may apply. The proper positioning of your smartphone in the vehicle for optimum GPS reception is very important! GARMIN hopes you enjoy navigating! More news and information: www.navigon.com / facebook www.navigon.com / twitter

description: Obsqr is a fast and simple QR code scanner. It does just one thing and does it well - it scans. Minimal design allows you to access QR content with a single tap. By the way, it's free and open-source - check http://bitbucket.org/trikita/obsqr Obsqr can decode the following QR types: URLs, phone numbers, SMS, geolocations, emails, contact information, applications on Market, wifi configuration and plain text. Note! We no longer support android devices running Android 2.2 Froyo and earlier versions. We are trying to keep the sources clear and simple, but camera orientation support, that was added only in Android 2.3, doesn't assume some elegant workaround on earlier OS versions. We are deeply sorry that 26 users won't get Obsqr updates and may recommend them to build an apk-file from the sources on bitbucket ( https://bitbucket.org/trikita/obsqr ). Thanks for understanding!
release_text: * New shiny almost material design * Rewritten a lot of code, fixed some content parsing erros, moving towards QRs with mixed content (e.g. text and URLs)

*** Excellence award winner of the Square Enix GDCI *** "A physics-based puzzle game, the kind of which you surely haven't played yet" – Phone Arena "A cool little puzzle game" – Gizmodo UK “There’s really no other puzzle game on Android quite as unusual yet inexplicably intriguing as The Domingos” – Super Game Droid The Domingos is an award winning physics based puzzle game that uses the “Domino effect” as a core mechanic in a wild west setting. This is a game for the strong willed puzzle game lovers. The Dandits attacked the Dodge City. Taken by surprise, the Domingos failed to defend themselves. The Dandits rounded up all the Dominitas in the town and fled back into the Bad Lands with them. Armed with cannon power, help the Domingos rescue their loved ones, and topple the Dandits to the ground. The Domingos(dominoes + amigos) is loaded with unique physics based puzzle elements, just like Angry Birds, Bad Piggies, and Cut the Rope. If you love being challenged in the cranium, The Domingos is a game you must try. Features: * 65 levels of mind bending puzzles. Line up the dominoes and fire * Solution unlocking. Can't topple the tough dominoes? Learn the secret to do so * Built-in undo feature for every action. Made a mistake with dominoes? No Bother
release_text: V 1.05 Few bug fixes ------------ V 1.04 Removed an unnecessary Phone Permission ------------ V 1.03 Black screen issue fixed on Galaxy s3 and other devices ------------ V 1.02 Improved loading times in the mid to low-end devices. ------------ V 1.01 Removed an unnecessary GPS location Permission

description: Email to self is the fastest way to send yourself a short e-mail, useful as quick reminder, for a to do list, a quick note to a colleague and stress-free productivity methods like GTD. You can use your Gmail Inbox as a to do list or note archive. A storage for your ideas or reminders for later review. With just a few taps, all the precious things in your mind will be safe in your inbox, available on all your devices! Never loose an idea again because you were not able to write it down. Email to Self is also very useful for quick communication with friends, wife or family and colleagues. TIP: Gmail inbox supports aliases with plus '+' character. For example, if your email address is myaddress@gmail.com , you can send emails to the address myaddress+todo@gmail.com . You can then create a filter on this address to assign label or perform actions. For more info on this please see https://support.google.com/mail/answer/12096 Features: - Send an email fast with only one button (after writing the text) - Best app for GTD inbox and getting things done - Perfect for todo lists and stress-free productivity - Uses your Gmail account as sender - Manages list of recipient addresses - You don't need to choose sender and recipient every time - You can send notes from other apps using the standard android share mechanism Requirements: - The sender email address must be a Gmail account configured on your Android device Please note that this is a Beta app. For problems, questions, feature requests or any other improvement please drop us an email!
release_text: New email handling engine that should fix cases of emails not sent Added pro version to remove ads Stability improvements

description: Race your way through various mazes, avoiding snakes, ninjas and poisonous skulls. - Control the pin using finger swipes to break all bubbles inside each maze - You can swipe before reaching a corner (see note below) - Avoid all enemies as they are lethal (all except the poisonous skull) - Snakes grow larger, touching their tail slows you down. - Vitamins make you stronger for a while so you can kick your enemies. - Some enemies leave bubbles on the maze, you have to break them too! - There are beacons that also throw bubbles and teleporters used to travel - Collect all 5 stars on to get the highest rating This game is and always will be free *Note: Control the pin using finger swipes. You can command the pin to turn BEFORE reaching a corner, by swiping earlier. You can also swipe anywhere on screen, even without lifting your finger (continuous swipe). Try it ! Have fun

Get the most out of your smartphone with Hi, a free communication app that makes free WiFi calls/video calls with your friends. Send text, voice, image and video messages as well. Save time, save money; switch from phone calls to Hi free WiFi calls now! WHY GET HI? ★ REAL FREE WIFI PHONE: You can call out to any mobile or land line for free! ★ ENCRYPTED SECURE CALLS: All Hi communications are encrypted with 256-bit AES and extremely secure! ★ NO HIDDEN COSTS AND COMPLETELY FREE: There is nothing to purchase and Hi will always be free. ★ NO SUBSCRIPTION NEEDED: Just enjoy the free WiFi calls and video calls without any subscription fee. ★ NO TIME LIMITED: There is not a time limitation for calls and you can talk whatever long you want with your friends and family. ★ AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY: You can make unlimited international voice/video calls between your Hi contacts for free with crystal clear audio quality. ★ NO ADS, NO PRIVACY CONCERN: Hi is completely free and financed by its sister game company. There are NO ADS so you can talk to you friends and family in this highly privacy protected app. ★ CAN BE USED WITH DATA: All Hi services are available with 4G/3G/EDGE. We charge you nothing. Carrier data charges may apply. ★ 720P HD VIDEO CALLS: The HD quality video call brings you and your family together wherever you are. ★ SWITCH FROM VOICE CALL TO VIDEO CALL: You can switch from voice call to HD Video call on the fly. ★ WORLD'S FIRST 10,000 GB FREE VIDEO CLOUD STORAGE: You'll never run out of space on your phone and miss out on capturing a moment with "Hi". With Thunderclap Technology, you can sync all your photos and videos on Hi and delete local copies to save your phone space. ★ INSTANT PHOTO/VIDEO SHARING: All your private cloud photo/video shares are instant and costs you no data traffic! ★ SAME AS SMS: All messages will be stored while your phone is shut off or without network. You can get them immediately when Hi launches next time. ★ AND MUCH MUCH MORE: Sent/Delivered/Read Status for Messages, Advanced Privacy Settings, Group Chats, Voice Messages, Tens of Thousands of Free Animated Stickers, Multi-Login, Web Chat, Free Custom Chat Bubbles, Share Locations, Free Custom Wallpapers and easily exchange contacts. To help make Hi a better app, please send us your feedback to support@hiapponline.com .

description: "Все, что может испортиться, портится. Все, что не может испортиться, портится тоже." Эта классическая формулировка закона Мэрфи служит верным научно-философским обоснованием множества фактов, аналогичных всегдашнему падению бутерброда маслом вниз. В этом бесплатном приложении собрано множество законов для широкого круга читателей. "Anything that can go wrong, spoiled. Everything can not be damaged, spoiled, too." This classic formulation of Murphy's Law is the best scientific and philosophical basis of the set of facts similar to the continual drop in butter sandwich down. This free app gathers many laws for the general reader.

Loyalty/member card apps are too many. Are you a merchant looking to deploy membership or loyalty programs for your customers ? This app is best place to start, mount your android device visible to your customers. For example if you are a restaurant, this could be by the check-in desk. Until explicitly selected to stop from scanning, app will continuously scan member cards to greet them, if qualified award stamps/points based on your rewards program. Your customer can track the number of points earned through consumer app downloaded from Google play called MMCard (mobile member card), which works in conjunction with this app.

Con RMob saprai perfettamente come e quando muoverti per raggiungere facilmente la tua destinazione! "Non ho la macchina, devo usare i mezzi pubblici" - Non c'è problema, appena avviato RMob potrai monitorare le fermate più vicine a te e saprai immediatamente quando passerà l'autobus! Inoltre potrai inserire una destinazione a tuo piacimento e vedere come arrivare a destinazione usando solo i mezzi pubblici. "Per lavoro sono costretto a muovermi solo con il mio mezzo privato" - RMob ti fornirà un percorso da effettuare in automobile: molti tratti della città sono monitorati per darti una stima sempre più attendibile del tempo necessario a completare il percorso. Inoltre avrai la possibilità di visualizzare dei parcheggi, ognuno con la disponibilità di posti in tempo reale! "Sono abbonato al servizio di bike sharing (o car sharing)" - RMob ti fornirà dei percorsi da effettuare sfruttando il servizio al quale sei abbonato! Potrai inoltre verificare lo disponibilità di bici delle stazione di bike sharing nelle tue vicinanze. "Ma quanto costa?" - RMob è gratis! Scaricalo subito! - RMob funziona anche senza l'uso del GPS!

description: How to study effectively? Want to master Danish vocabulary? Danish flashcards are images/text/sound on cards, used to help remember new vocabulary in Danish . Instead of simply reading the definition in a dictionary, the brain is also challenged via our several learning modes: Study, Slide show, Matching, Memorize, Quiz, Spelling, Re-arrange to make the learning Danish language more exciting and fun. ♥ ♥ GREAT CONTENT ♥ ♥ Danish flashcards app includes 4000+ premade Danish flashcards which cover the most used Danish words from 9 categories: •Calendar •Description •Hobbies •Food and Meals •Human •Nature •Objects •Society •Travel Basic features: • Import cardsets from Couser hero, Quizlet, Flashcard exchange. • Track study progress using Leitner system. • Display statistics for cards and games • Search cardsets from our database with millions of flashcards on various subjects. • Review schedule to help you review flashcards before they are expired. • Customize flashcards by selecting font, background and languages. • Access flashcards created from http://www.superflashcard.com Premium features: • Text to speech to study flashcards without looking at screens. • Download unlimited flashcards to your devices for offline study • Customize text color and background color/images of cards This app is also available on Apple App Store, Amazon Kindle App Store, Blackberry App Store and Windows Phone App Store. Please visit us at http://about.superflashcard.com/tour/ for more information .

description: Play the ultimative soccer app for the world cup 2014 in brazil and become the flying football world champion in this brazilian adventure! An epic saga of the lost hero vs. the dangerous world! Story: In the game of his life at the world cup 2014 in brazil the tiny football Peppy is shot by a soccer player into the brasilian jungle! Fortunately he has a touch down into an ancient goal slingshot in the amazon temple area... try to run through the jungle of brazil and flick your way home to the championship bowl! But be careful there are many many risks you have to survive. It won´t be easy to fly through the jungle but with some skillful you´ll do it and all the time the landmark, the great christus figure from Rio de Janeiro will be watching you. Peppy football Rio will thrill you from the very first second. Sometimes it´s very tricky but never frustrating. Discover the dangers of the jungle. There are the angry looking monster statues, the flappy but happy birds, nasty plants, the amazon temple, golden snakes…… How to play: Touch the football Peppy in the slingshot, drag and flick the slingshot to grab the golden wings to transfrom. (Don't flick the ball with the slingshot to the left or he will directly crush!) Catch the mystic wings-ball to get Peppy tiny wings and a fluffy tail to become – Flappy Peppy! Once you transformed into Flappy Peppy, just tap to fly! Dash through the jungle of brazil and try to stay in the perfect line between angry plants, tiny birds and antique statues. Don't tap to relax your wings and dive under a bird – or crush it. (Brazilian birds really get angry by flappy intruders!) Be careful – sometimes 1 bird approaches you – sometimes there are 2 birds in your way! Collect bonus candies like the candy magnet, which pulls the the golden coins automatically, the candy slomo, which slows down the time or the candy treasure box, that doubles the coins you can collect. Don't let Flappy Peppy catch the candy speedup – it doubles your speed and it will become hard to not crush into a barrier. Cut across the crystal cave - full of diamonds and jewels and run Flappy Peppy through the ancient golden amazon temple area to collect even more coins! (The amazon temple area is full of gold coins – a good chance to boost your score!) There you will have to fight vs. plants, snakes and the giant jungle ventilator. If you crush into an angry plant, or have a clash with a bird, no sorrow, you can replay your home run – you have 100's of balls and no one dies in this game! Collect all the golden coins on your run, to achieve medals and cups rated 1, 2, and 3 stars on your achievements page! Features: One touch game play! (Flick & Fly) Amazing graphics and soundtracks! Kids friendly - no one really dies in this game, no zombies or evil monsters. Tons of funny animations, enemies and obstacles, angry plants and tiny birds! Google game service - high score and achievements! Social Sharing-Features, like „send a friend“ with the email button or share your high score on twitter to challenge your friends to beat your score! (You can share your score on twitter by touching the twitter-button in the main menu or choose the twitter-button in the game) Check out the 2 extra pages in the main menu – Options and More games from pepworks! If you want to support the developers, this game offers an in-app purchase to remove the advertising. Do you like the game? Then please write a super review it in the App Store! (Rating and reviews will help us develop more content and more levels and games) Please recommend this epic football saga to your friends and family! This game is not about football stars, soccer tables, shooting goals, angry soccer referees or goal charts. It's about having a lot of fun (on your home run) in the pauses between the soccer matches of the world cup 2014 in Rio :)

America's Weird Laws! Read these awesomely crazy, strange, odd, bizarre, dumb, funny, random and extremely weird laws in the United States of America! You won't believe how absurd and stupid some of these laws are! It is unknown if some of these laws are still in effect, but they are nevertheless fun to read and share with others. Are these laws facts nowadays in the US? Most of them are not facts anymore due to changes over the numbers of years, but they are still fun to read! Check your legal doc, dictionary, procedures, codes and briefs if you want to challenge the validity of these laws! Download this FREE app for hours of fun! People are making lots of noises about how popular this app has been, so don't miss out! This app can be used to prank your friends about the changing laws in your state. Save your favorite weird laws easily and quickly. Share your favorite weird laws via Email! Sounds good? Then voice your opinion with a nice review! Even celebrities call to say how much fun this app is! SMS your favorite weird laws! But make sure to park your car first; don't text while driving! Phone calls while driving is not legal in most states! Paste your favorite weird laws into Facebook or Twitter! Enjoy!

description: Help yourself and other drivers save money and get the cheapest fuel around by sharing the details of petrol filling stations you know about. Using this App you can always find the best price for Unleaded, Diesel and LPG petrol in the UK and Ireland, potentially saving you large amounts of money each year: - Browse the map to find petrol stations - Click a station to view existing fuel prices or update - Find the best petrol prices in your area - Add new petrol stations - Completely Ad free - Customize the list of fuels - Filter by petrol station brand - Track your current location - Show directions to petrol stations - Search for petrol station addresses - No annual subscription! Over 50,000 filling stations globally and growing! All the major brands are included such as Shell, BP, Esso, Texaco, Total, Gulf etc, and you can view Unleaded, Diesel, LPG and other fuel types. Our unofficial Diablo 3 Database - or Diatabase in short - is intended to provide you with the most relevant information regarding the upcoming dark fantasy/horror-themed action role-playing game Diablo 3 - development by Blizzard Entertainment®. We have taken a whole different and very lightweight approach to provide users with the most up to date ingame content. All you need is our small client app which will download and store the latest game information from our database. Diatabase works offline and will only connect to our servers for detection of updates and synchronization. This also means that there's no need to update the installed app in Google Play over and over again. For a regular patch without major new content a synchronization results in only a few kilobytes transfer volume! If you find a bug, experience strange behavior or if you have any suggestions to improve Diatabase, please don't hesitate to contact us via email at diatabase@holzapps.com or leave a comment at http://blog.holzapps.com Diatabase includes: - Latest Diablo3 News - Items (Armor, Weapons, Other) - Skills (Active and Passive) - Quests - Lore (Journal, Bestiary, Other) - Different content based on your chosen hero class - Search function - Skill calculator - Equipment Planner And there are yet a lot more features to come! Diablo® III and Blizzard Entertainment® are all trademarks or registered trademarks of Blizzard Entertainment in the United States and/or other countries. These terms and all related materials, logos, and images are copyright © Blizzard Entertainment. This app is in no way associated with or endorsed by Blizzard Entertainment®. This app uses Google Analytics and BugSense for gathering anonymous app-usage statistics to allow us to further increase the user experience.

description: Did you know that New Orleans is the most musical place on earth? Now you can experience the unique music and culture of New Orleans FREE on your Android!

You can test your IQ while having fun with custom made questions prepared by professionals. Prepare to give both halves of your brain a workout! Puzzles, anagrams, number sequences and many more unique questions. Brain Games will be an excellent brain exercise for you. While solving questions you will learn to look things from a different perspective and this will benefit you in your daily life. First questions might be easy but don't let it mislead you, it will get harder with every question. Last questions will only be solved by geniuses. If you stuck on some question you can look for the answers in our facebook page which can be accessed through the like button in the application. But remember, this way you will lack the satisfaction of solving them by yourself. Brain Games | Android is one of the most popular brain games as well as being the most diffucult and unique one. Warning: Pay attention to the upper/lowercase letters and don't leave space before or after the answer. Use send button when answering.

-------------------------- MY NEW APP Unlock with WiFi unlocks your device when you're connected to your home WiFi! https://market.android.com/details?id=com.benhirashima.unlockwithwifi -------------------------- Sometimes you're viewing a web page in a browser, and you decide you want to open it in a different browser. Maybe the page looks funny or it's loading slowly in the current browser. How do you open a page you're already viewing in another browser? Well, you could copy and paste the URL, but that's more work than it should be. Now you can use Choose Browser. If you "share" a page or link from any app, you can select Choose Browser, then you will be presented with a list of installed browsers. You can share a link from one browser to another. You can share a link from, say, your RSS reader, and choose which browser to open it in. It's nothing fancy, but it saves you a little time. The app is very handy for mobile web development, when you have to test your website in different browsers. If this app doesn't work on your device, please email me, and I will fix it. This app may not work on some recent HTC phones, because of a change HTC has made to their version Android. You can thank Apple and it's lawyers for that. This app is free, with no ads.

Statistical Process Control is a statistical tool of Statistical Quality Control, used by the quality professional. Control Charts aid the Six Sigma professional in the process of determining if a process is under control. All you need to do is to enter numbers separated by spaces and see the results immediately. List of features: - X-Bar Chart - Range (R) Chart - P-Chart - C-Chart - Process Capability, Cp, Cpk - Theory and examples. Statistical Process Control is applied in order to monitor and control a process. SPC can be applied to any process where the "conforming product" (product meeting specifications) output can be measured. Applied to Production processes as well as services, Hotels, Restaurants, Banks... You could study the examples and try to design a method to monitor your production process or service. Your last data are persistent. You can close and reopen your app and to continue adding data. data will be deleted when you start a new data set. Your comments will be appreciated and I have the commitment of improve the application with more features.
release_text: 2.5 version - Enter values separated by spaces or symbol 2.4 version - Scrollview in Cp/Cpk input form. 2.3 version - KitKat 4.4 compatibility. description: ※※※ Snap Desk only works on Samsung devices since it uses Samsung S-Pen SDK ※※※ Snap Desk is a memo management app which can be opened by simple touch. 1. Features - You can open it while using other apps. Even when you are playing games or browsing the web, just drag near the snap region and it will come out. - You don't need to name the memo or make folders to manage them. Move and set memo types to categorize and manage them like your actual desk. 2. Tips - Each memo can have different background colors according to Heart(♥), Diamond(♦), Club(♣), Spade(♠) types. You can set memo types by its priority or category. - You can even rotate memo by two fingers on arrange mode. - Pen and eraser mode changes in turn when you press S-pen button on hovering. - Desk will be collapsed when you double tap the black size control bar. - Sometimes Snap Desk may be terminated suddenly by Android OS if there's very little memory left. 3. Etc - The difference between full version and free version is only the ads. If you don't like ads or you would like to donate, please buy the full version. - Evernote, box, Dropbox, SkyDrive, Google Drive cloud sync will be implemented soon. - FlyingBus Studio's another app Snap Pad is available. Snap Pad and Snap Desk are similar but main targets are different. If you want to write memo quickly for idea sketch or doodling, use Snap Pad. Or if you want to write several memo and manage them, use Snap Desk. Both are from same developer, and both will be updated continually.
release_text: v1.24 Fixed compatibility issues for some old devices. v1.23 Fixed compatibility issues for some devices. v1.22 Limited desk expandable width due to edge screen overlap (Only on Galaxy Note Edge when sliding from left) v1.21 - Lollipop support. - No need to download explicit spen sdk anymore. - Edge screen compatibility for Galaxy Note 4 Edge. (Recommend left snap region option though) - Minor bug fixes - 64bit support - Cache added. Faster opening recent memos.

description: This is the demo version if *the* german crossword dictionary available for Android. The demo version includes just the answers with five characters, but the rest is fully functional! The full version includes almost 600,000 items from all categories. All data is included in the app, no internet connection is needed using this app. Just specify the character count of the answer, fill in some key words of the question, provide the characters you already know, and you will have the answer as soon as you hit the search button. The demo version is limited to answers with a character count of five. The app needs about 7 megabytes of free diskspace on the sdcard to unpack its databases. The full version is also available here at Google Play. ★ Please contact me in case of any problems before you leave a bad comment / ranking. I will solve your problem! ★

Cette application vous permet de regarder les chaînes de télévision disponibles via le bouquet Freebox TV lorsque vous êtes sur un réseau Wifi de la box de l'opérateur français Free. La liste des chaînes est présentée et vous pouvez facilement choisir la qualité que vous désirez regarder. Une option permet d'ignorer l'activation du Wifi sur votre périphérique, utile si vous voulez pouvoir regarder la TV en 3G (tutorial disponible ici : http://www.infobidouille.com/2013/05/20/tuto-acces-a-distance-aux-flux-tv-freebox-via-un-vpn/) . ***** Pour les problèmes de son (uniquement sur les chaînes en bas débit), ce logiciel n'est pas en cause mais c'est le lecteur vidéo utilisé qui n'est pas toujours capable de le décoder. Si vous trouvez un meilleur lecteur, n'hésitez pas à me le communiquer ! ***** Veuillez noter que le fonctionnement d'un flux dépend uniquement du logiciel de lecture utilisé. Dans la majorité des cas, les flux automatiques / standards fonctionnent correctement sur les téléphones récents. Peu de téléphones / tablettes ont la puissance requise pour le moment pour lire les chaînes en HD de façon convenable. v1.03 : Intégration de liens vers des lecteurs vidéo alternatifs, d'un paramètrage pour ôter les chaînes HD. v1.02 : Intégration d'un mode de rendu expérimental pour les problèmes de son sur les flux bas-débit. Le rendu se base sur Vitamio qui est un plugin à installer à partir du store à la première utilisation. Il est possible de désactiver le mode de rendu expérimental pour utiliser son propre lecteur (VPlayer semble donner des résultats corrects) en sélectionnant l'option dans les paramètres. This application lets you watch TV channels available via Freebox TV when on a WiFi network box for French operator Free. The channel list is presented and you can easily choose the quality you want to watch. One option to skip activation WiFi on your device, useful if you want to watch TV over 3G (tutorial available here: http://www.infobidouille.com/2013/05/20/tuto-acces- a-distance-to-stream-tv-freebox-via-a-vpn /). ***** For sound problems (only on low bandwidth channels), this software is not in question but it is the used video player that is not always able to decode it. If you find a better reader, do not hesitate to contact me! ***** Please note that the operation of a flow depends only on the reading software used. In most cases, the automatic flow / Standard work properly on newer phones. Few phones / tablets have the power needed for the time to read the HD channels appropriately. v1.03: Integration links to alternative video players, a parameter setting to remove the HD channels. v1.02: Integration of an experimental rendering mode for sound problems on low speed flows. The record is based on Vitamio which is a plugin to install from the store in the first use. It is possible to disable the experimental rendering mode to use its own drive (VPlayer seems to give correct results) by selecting the option in the settings.
release_text: v1.08 : Ajout de l'option pour ignorer l'activation du wifi v1.07 : lien vers Wondershare au lieu de Daroon, corrections chaînes non visible sur Freebox v5 v1.06 : corrections bugs divers... v1.05 : ajout de la possibilité de supprimer les pubs (achat depuis l'application, 1.50€) v1.04 : Ajout de la recherche dans les flux, refonte de l'interface pour les tablettes sous Honeycomb, préparation d'un mode permettant de supprimer les publicités.

description: Watch full episodes of your favorite CBS shows for free. Enjoy primetime, daytime and late night episodes on-demand from America’s most watched network with the app for Android phone and tablet! Stay caught up on hit CBS TV shows like Blue Bloods, CSI, CSI: Cyber, NCIS, The Good Wife, The Big Bang Theory, Madam Secretary, 2 Broke Girls, Mike & Molly, Criminal Minds, The Late Show with Stephen Colbert, The Young and the Restless and many more! * Free primetime episodes in HD with 8 day delay (next day for CBS All Access subscribers) * Free daytime and late night episodes in HD the day after they air * Personalized show lists and notifications with ‘My CBS’ * Primetime schedule and photo galleries * Resume episode playback from where you left off Get the most out of the app by subscribing to ‘CBS All Access’ to enjoy the following exclusive benefits and features: * Next-day access to the latest primetime episodes in HD * Live TV streaming from local CBS stations (select markets) * Access to library of over 7,500 episodes including every episode of every season of top shows such as NCIS, The Good Wife, Survivor, Scorpion, and Hawaii 5-0. * Ad-free viewing for classic shows and fan favorites such as Star Trek, I Love Lucy, CSI: Miami and more. Try CBS All Access for 1 week FREE, then pay only $5.99 per month thereafter. Download the CBS app to get started! Show and episode availability subject to change. Please note use of the CBS app is limited to United States. Video is accessible via 3G, 4G, LTE, and WiFi networks. Data charges may apply. All Access promotional offers for new subscribers only. Live TV subject to availability. Prices shown are in U.S. dollars. Other restrictions apply. description: "Petites Choses" is a game for 2 year old kids. They explore a poetic world with original mini-games, searching for keys that will release a small bird from its cage. With "Petites Choses" your children enjoy the mini games, they discover surprises scattered throughout the scene, are captivated by the ambient poetry, while pursuing the main goal: see the little bird fly happily through the landscape. Highlights: - A touching universe with light hand-drawn illustrations, fine animations, sweet and original music. - A stimulating goal for toddlers, to constantly renew - A universal game, without instructions, with intuitive navigation - Designed for (and tested by) toddlers - Optimized for Retina display screens - No ads, no in-app purchase If you like the app, don’t hesitate to support us and leave a review on the App Store. 2014 – C'est Magnifique Find us on the web: www.benjamingibeaux.fr www.cestmagnifique.fr

Dungeon Adventure: Heroic Edition Game inspired by tabletop RPGs, roguelike games and some MMORPG. First choose your hero.Then delve and explore deadly randomly generated dungeons, fight with monster and powerful bosses, gain experience and equipment. Features: - Randomly generated dungeons. - Choose one of the four difficulties: Normal, Hard, Heroic and Epic - Unlock and cast spells like: True Strike, Flame Weapon, Arcane Ward etc. - A lot of randomly generated equipment. Find best items for your hero! - If your hero dies there is no way to resurrect him - Special "Adventure levels". Gain this levels give you special points that you can spend on perks. If your hero die you wont lost your Adventure levels. - Two base (Amazon and Barbarian, for Heroic Ed. there more base heroes available) and nine character to unlock. Dwarf - master of defense. Vampire - steal life from enemies. Assassin - master of deadly arts. And others like Wizard, Druid, Huntress, Cleric etc. - Gather resources and arcane dust to craft powerful items that help you in your adventures. Heroic Edition Bonuses: - No in game Ads. - New hero Shadow. - New hero Templar. - New hero Sorceress - All heroes available from start, no need to unlock them. - More bonuses will be in next updates. You can try Dungeon Adventure standard edition for free. Twitter: https://twitter.com/AdventurerRo

description: Never lose your car again! Car Finder AR automatically keeps track of where you park. Use augmented reality, 3D Google Maps and radar to find your parked car. ★New GPS Auto Track module will also allow you to track your car from home★ ★Get driving directions to the nearest car park★ This app has been reviewed in the book "Amazing Android Apps For Dummies" Features: ✔Saves location automatically when turning off the car * ✔New GPS Auto track / Car recovery mode to track your car if it gets stolen * ✔Augmeted reality/3D Maps/RADAR view to find your way back to your parked car ✔Shows nearby car parks on the map ✔Driving/Walking directions to your parked car ✔Manage up to 3 different cars ✔Send Email/Whatsapp/Line with the location of your car ** ✔Store a log on Google Calendar *** ✔Home screen widget for saving location with just one click, one for each car ✔Parking meter alarm ✔Parking timer ✔Save notes ✔Location history ✔Shake to save ✔Tell your mates where your car is by sharing location ✔Advanced algorithms that will NOT drain your battery -------------------------------------- Comments from some users: "I would be lost without it! Now updated for Ice Cream Sandwich and seems to work great on my Galaxy Nexus. Fantastic! This is a well written, excellent program. Not only will it help you find your car, but it will help you keep track of where you have been. The developer is responsive and very helpful. Update 1-17-2013 This is probably the most important app I use on my Galaxy Nexus next to GMail itself. Significant enhancements now include the ability to track yourself at regular intervals. I use it to update my Google calendar when I disconnect and reconnect to my vehicle Bluetooth. This is useful for IRS requirements and keeping track of time spent at individual client locations. I have zero problems with the app. You set it up and forget about it. It updates your calendar automatically. I give this app 5 plus stars!" "Is very helpful. I had a problem and the response was fast and very courteous." "This is a great app if you have Bluetooth in your car... The automatic memorization of last location is a godsend! Especially when parking in a atrange parking lot." "Great. I have jelly bean and it runs perfect." "Excellent tool Love the new features. Auto save on Bluetooth disconnect has made usage so easy. No need to remember to save the position manually." -------------------------------------- * You need to have bluetooth connection in your car. ** This app will never send any email automatically nor access your contacts list. *** This app only writes to your calendar. It does not read nor share any of your calendar entries.

description: Application réservée aux journalistes professionnels. Stop à la pollution de vos boîtes mails par les attachés de presse ! Agenda Journalistes fournit l’agenda quotidien des principaux évènements (politiques, économiques, culturels, sports, loisirs) qui se déroulent dans les principales villes françaises (Paris, Lyon, Marseille, Lille, Toulouse, Bordeaux, Nantes, Strasbourg, Nice). Les journalistes peuvent filtrer (par rubriques et par ville) les évènements qui les intéressent, dont ils auront les dates, adresses, dossiers de presse, accès au formulaire d’accréditation, etc. Application for professional journalists. Journalists agenda provides the daily agenda of the main events (political, economic, cultural, sports, leisure) taking place in major French cities (Paris, Lyon, Marseille, Lille, Toulouse, Bordeaux, Nantes, Strasbourg, Nice). Journalists can be filtered (by topic and city) the events that interest them, they'll dates, addresses, press releases, access the accreditation form, etc.

description: 元祖・伝説の不良ゲームが待望のネイティブアプリ化！ ■待望のユーザー同時対戦機能を実現！ ■パワーアップした本格3Dポリゴンバイク！ ■本気のオンラインバトル！ ■フルアニメーションのアクション喧嘩！ ◆選べるバイクは3タイプ！ 定番のアメリカン・ネイキッドに加え、根強いファンを持つビッグスクーターが仲間入り！ お気に入りのタイプを選んでてめえ色に染め上げろ！ ◆仏恥義理ハイクオリティ3Dバイク！ プレステ4も顔負けの3Dバイクパーツを組み合わせて、てめぇだけのオリジナル愛車を作ろう！ さらにマイページでは3Dバイクが廻る！拡大できる！360度様々な角度から愛車を眺め倒せ！ ◆最大8色の豪華色展開システム！ 色展開の付いたバイクパーツはいつでも色変更可能！ 最大8色の色展開で、ぶっちぎりに無限大の着せ替えが楽しめる！ ◆カスタム屋さんでチューニング！ 弱いパーツはカスタムで強化可能！ さらに耐久値もMAX回復できて、一石二鳥！ お気に入りのバイクで完全無欠の最強ヤンキーを目指せ！ ◆リアルタイム抗争バトル！ チームを組んで目指すはテッペン、全国制覇！ リアルユーザー同士のオンライン対戦は手に汗握るガチンコ激闘！ ステータス分析、時間帯指定など、知略を凝らした最凶ヤンキーの仁義なき戦いに乗り遅れるな！ ◆革命的新機能・シャウトで叫べ！ リアルタイムの抗争中に敵や仲間に向かっててめぇの言葉で叫べるぞ！ 敵を挑発？ツレを応援？何でもありの叫んだモン勝ちだ！ ◆フルアニメーション「タイマン」バトル！ 個性豊かな不良どもにケンカ挑んでレベルを上げろ！ 超ド派手なアクションを繰り出す必殺技を覚えれば、格上の敵にも勝てるかも！？ 下克上は不良ゲームの醍醐味だよな！ ◆ランキング登場で目指せ圧倒的存在感！ 強さが全ての爆伝では各種ワルランキングが随時更新中！ 上位独占の有名ユーザーになってライバル達をビビらせろ！ ◆着飾れ！美麗ヤンキーアバター！ 悪羅悪羅系、チンピラ系、セーラー服、極道系、お色気、ネタ系まで、 ヤンキー界のトレンドをふんだんに取り入れた激ヤバなアバターが目白押し！ ヤクザもホストも、キャバ嬢もギャルも、己のセンスを魅せ付けろ！ ◆チャット機能で協力プレイがもっと楽しくなる！ ツレとこっそり密談もよし！ チームメンバーでグループ会議もできるぞ！ ◆チームで協力プレイ！ 一匹狼でも楽しめるが、チームに入るともっと楽しい！ チーム協力イベントは祭りのごとき盛り上がり！ 総長になって一国一城に主になるのも夢じゃないぜ？ 最高のダチと共に刻め、不良の華道！ ◆成長期な爆伝（バクデン）を夜露死苦！ 爆伝はまだまだ成長途中。可能性は無限大！ ユーザーの意見を参考にどんどん変身していくぜ！ 飽和状態のトラゲームからは早いとこ乗り換えた方が身の為だぜ？ --------------------------------------------- 【！】身に覚えはありませんか？【！】 ・任侠ものが好き ・どちらかというと熱血系だ ・くにおくんにはまっていた ・コールに凝っている ・チャンプロードまたはカミオンが好き ・旧車が好き ・デコトラが好き ・覇王伝に興味がある ・ホンダ、ヤマハ、カワサキ、スズキなど、単車には特別なこだわりがある ・休日はパチンコ、パチスロでつぶれる ・あの頃は暴走族だった、または現在暴走族である ・口癖が天上天下唯我独尊 ・ギャングだった想い出がある ・特攻服を持っている ・義理堅い方だ ・単車の虎が好き ・ナックルバウトが好き ・ギャングロードが好き ・LINEツムツムやパズル＆ドラゴンなどのゲームが好き ・育成ゲームにハマったことがある ・暇つぶしにはついつい無料ゲームをしてしまう ↑一つでも当てはまる人には爆走！不良伝説をおすすめします Bad game of the original, legendary native app of the long-awaited! ■ Achieve user simultaneous play long-awaited feature! ■ full-scale 3D polygon bike you power up! ■ Online Battle serious! ■ Action fights full animation! ◆ bike you choose from three types! In addition to the naked American classic, big scooter that has a strong fan join! The Someagero to dickward color and type and choose a favorite! ◆ Futsuhaji-law high-quality 3D bike! PlayStation 4 is also a combination of 3D Motorcycle Parts of shame, Let's make the original car of just the hell! 3D bike Liaoning in My Page and more! Can be expanded! description: iTooch Anglais 5ème est une application de soutien scolaire ludique, conçue par des enseignants, qui couvre le programme scolaire officiel d'anglais en 5ème. Utilisées par plus de 5.000.000 de personnes dans 146 pays, les applications iTooch sont nées de la rencontre d'enseignants passionnés, de pédagogues et de professionnels du jeu vidéo, eux-mêmes parents. L'union de ces savoir-faire a permis d’offrir aux enfants un merveilleux complément scolaire qui leur donne envie d’apprendre et qui leur permet de s’entrainer sur tout le programme officiel de leur classe. ♖ FONCTIONNALITES ♖ • Une interface simple, claire et ludique • Une gestion multi-joueurs permettant la sauvegarde des scores de plusieurs enfants sur un même smartphone ou tablette • Réglage de la taille des textes • Tableau virtuel et calculatrice intégrés • Mode déconnecté disponible pour profiter de nos applications même sans connexion Internet • Synchronisation automatique des contenus • Des résumés de cours qui reprennent les notions fondamentales à connaître par les élèves • Des power ups spécialement conçus pour motiver et donner petit un coup de pouce ! ★ App sélectionnée dans les tops du guide Les meilleures applications pour enfants 2015 - par la Souris Grise ★ ♫ TEMOIGNAGES DE PARENTS ♫ ‣ "L’application pour réviser ou se remettre à niveau – Enfin une application ludique où mon fils peut apprendre et améliorer ses notes, il y a plein d’exercices, un résumé du cours, un grand bravo pour cette application." ‣ " Mon fils est en 5ème, cela lui permet de faire d’autres exercices (correspondant exactement au programme) que les 3-4 proposés sur son livre. Merci infiniment. De plus c’est plus ludique sur tablette que sur le papier. Je recommande" ★ CE QU'EN DISENT LES ENSEIGNANTS ★ ‣ "Cette application rencontre un franc succès auprès de mes élèves en remise à niveau. Chacun d’entre eux éprouve le besoin de travailler des points différents. La tablette leur permet de définir leur progression personnelle et de travailler à leur rythme. Ils peuvent me solliciter à la moindre difficulté ou incompréhension, ce qui rend – à mon sens – la séance nettement plus productive." ‣ "En plus des séances individuelles, j’utilise iTooch en classe entière en vidéo-projection et les élèves “accrochent” vraiment. Le côté ludique du travail et les animations de la mascotte plaisent vraiment. Les élèves ayant une tablette à la maison m’ont même demandé où acheter l’application !" ☀ L'APPLICATION CONTIENT : ☀ ✓ 4 thèmes : Vie quotidienne, Goûts et aliments vêtements, Société, Voyage et culture ✓ 50 chapitres par titre, avec résumé de cours, exemples et dessins ✓ 1 519 questions par titre avec indices et réponses détaillées ➡ iTooch Anglais 5ème réunit de loin la plus grande base d'exercices pour le collège sur Google Play. Retrouvez également nos applications iTooch Français 5ème et iTooch Mathématiques 5ème sur Google Play. Les applications iTooch offrent une solution de soutien scolaire mobile pour les classes de CP, CE1, CE2, CM1, CM2, 6e, 5e, 4e et 3e en Mathématiques, Français, Anglais et Physique-Chimie. ***A la demande de nombreux utilisateurs qui souhaitent bénéficier d'une application gratuite, nous mettons à disposition une version gratuite intégrant de la publicité. Cette option nous permet de rendre accessible nos contenus au plus grand nombre. La publicité peut être supprimée à tout moment très simplement au travers d'un achat dans l'app. Une version de l’application sans publicité et dédiée aux enseignants et aux établissements scolaires est disponible. Nous vous invitons à découvrir cette version sur notre site : www.edupad.com/fr/ecoles *** ☎ CONTACT ☎ ‣ Facebook: http://facebook.com/itoochapps ‣ Twitter: @itooch ‣ Site: http://edupad.com 5th iTooch English tutoring is a fun application designed by teachers, which covers the English official curriculum in 5th. Used by more than 5,000,000 people in 146 countries, iTooch applications were born from the meeting of passionate teachers, educationalists and video game professionals, themselves parents. The union of these skills allowed to offer children a wonderful learning tool that desire to learn and that allows them to train them on all the official program of their class. ♖ FEATURES ♖ • A simple, clear and fun interface • A multiplayer for saving scores of several children in a single smartphone or tablet management • Adjust text size • Virtual Table and integrated calculator • Offline Mode available to enjoy our applications even without an Internet connection • Automatic synchronization of content • Courses summaries that reflect the fundamentals to know by students • The specially designed power ups to motivate and give a little boost! ★ App featured in the tops of the guide The best applications for children 2015 - by Grey Mouse ★ ♫ ♫ PARENTS OF TESTIMONY ‣ "The application for review or to upgrade. - Finally a fun application where my son can learn and improve his grades, there are plenty of exercises, a summary of the course, a big applause for this application" ‣ "My son is in 5th, this allows him to do other exercises (corresponding exactly to the program) than the 3-4 offered on his book. Thank you very much. And it's more fun on tablets than on paper. I recommend" ★ WHAT TEACHERS SAY ★ ‣ "This application meets a great success with my students in upgrading. Each of them feel the need to work different points. The tablet allows them to define their personal progress and work at their own pace. They can me apply to any difficulty or misunderstanding, making - in my view - the significantly more productive session. " ‣ "In addition to individual sessions, I use iTooch whole class in video projection and students" hang "really. The playful side of work and the animations of the mascot really like. Students with a shelf at home m 'even asked where to buy the app! " The CONTAINS ☀ APPLICATION: ☀ ✓ 4 themes: Daily Life, Food Tastes and clothing, Travel and Culture ✓ 50 chapters per title, with abstract classes, examples and drawings ✓ 1,519 questions per title with clues, detailed answers ➡ iTooch English 5th brings by far the largest database of exercises for college on Google Play. Also find our applications iTooch French 5th and 5th Mathematics iTooch on Google Play. The iTooch applications provide mobile solution for tutoring classes CP, CE1, CE2, CM1, CM2, 6th, 5th, 4th and 3rd in Mathematics, French, English and Physics and Chemistry. *** At the request of many users who want a free application, we offer a free version incorporating advertising. description: Use this App, and have everyone gawking at your creative talent! Doesn’t matter whether they be pictures or photographs, this App helps you create identical images. Draw identical copies of the images that appear on the Live View Screen – it will be as if you’re drawing with tracing paper(Tracing Phone)! Show off drawings created by yours truly! ★ Keep your smart phone steady with objects you find around the house, such as a thick dictionary, a book, or even a cup, in order to create better results. Using a smart phone holder is also another option. ★ In order to draw a picture of a photograph you have just taken, make sure that the background of the photograph is bright, as brighter the background, the better chances of being able to trace more precisely. This App allows you to become an illustrator, an artist. Want to be able to draw your versions of pretty, adorable comic characters? Want to draw a picture of our favorite celebrity? What to draw a beautiful picture of your family and loved ones? Want to draw a picture of your dream car? You don’t need to resister at an art school to learn to draw awesome pictures. Show off, or even offer these self-drawn pictures as presents to those around you. You can draw anything – from a photograph you have just taken to your favorite celebrity, a cool car, or even another drawing you have always liked. You can take a picture of your family then use it as a drawing tool, or even draw a picture of your loved one’s face on to a letter and have it sent. You can also select the type of picture you want to draw, you even trace a photograph in your photo gallery. To take advantage of this application, you can finish with oilpaper(transparent paper) or tracing reap the benefits of using a light box. It can also be utilized for children’s art education purposes. *Due to specific patents on this App, creating similar Apps may raise copyright issues. How to use: 1.Either choose a picture of your choice or even take an instant photograph. Fix your phone steady, choose to ‘draw’, then prepare to start your drawing. 2.When the tracing paper appears on screen, trace the image carefully by looking at the smart phone’s live view screen. Remember to switch on and off the options that make both the tracing paper, as well as the focus indicator, appear and disappear. 3.Once you are done tracing out a basic sketch of the image, adjust the transparency of the smart phone to control color, shading, and even texture, in order to express yourself. 4.If the focus of the Live View seems unsteady, switch on the automatic focus finder button to adjust the focus of the picture. Switch it off once you are ready once again. 5.Also, if you want to draw a picture of a photograph you have just taken, you need not do it on-site. Take it somewhere you are comfortable with, choose the “draw picture of image in photo gallery” option to view the photograph. You will be able to create a beautiful drawing of the image that had been saved on to your phone.

description: Carmageddon is the original freeform driving sensation, where pedestrians (and cows!) equal points, and your opponents are a bunch of crazies in a twisted mix of automotive killing machines. The game features anarchic drive-wherever-you-like gameplay and over-the-top surreal comedy violence. It’s the racing game where racing is for wimps. Now the same Mac & PC classic that was BANNED AROUND THE WORLD is back and available on Android phones and tablets! Carmageddon features real-world environments that have been turned into killing fields, where the locals stay out on the streets at their peril. As well as using your car as a weapon, every level is sprinkled generously with power-ups that have a vast variety of mad effects, adding a whole extra level of craziness to the proceedings. In every event you have the option to “play it your way”… Waste all your opponents, kill every pedestrian, or (perish the thought) complete all the laps. Oh and watch out – the cops in their super-tough armoured patrol vehicles are lurking, and if they catch you being bad they’ll be down on you like several tons of cold pork! FEATURES • 28 dangerously deranged Opponents • 11 wildly exhilarating Environments • Career Mode featuring 36 satisfyingly violent Levels • Race and Wreck opponents to unlock 30 playable cars! • Multiple control methods: digital, analogue (mix ‘n’ match), tilt • Edit your control layout in game to your preferences • Comprehensive Action Replay System • Environment maps and other special effects • Enhanced pre-lit environments • Buckets of gibs • Tons of laughs Plus the opportunity to make in app purchases to unlock ALL the cars (apart from the secret one) and ALL the races! Carmageddon requires Android 2.3.4 or later. AWARDS AND RECOGNITION FOR THE ORIGINAL GAME Carmageddon won the “Game of the Year” trophy in the 1997 PC Zone Reader awards. Carmageddon 1 & 2 were “Driving Game of the Year” 1997/1998. SELECTED REVIEWS OF THE ORIGINAL GAME Originally released for the PC in 1997, Carmageddon was an instant hit and the titles went on to sell over 2 million copies worldwide. Here’s what a sample of the gaming press thought at the time: “Carmageddon is visceral, violent, vehicular fun...” - GameSpot 8.8 out of 10 “Carmageddon, to get straight to the point, is one of the best computer games I've ever played… Carmageddon is God!” - Duncan McDonald 95% Classic Award PC Zone Magazine “Carmageddon is one of those games that only come along once in a blue moon. An essential purchase.” - Escape Magazine 6 out of 6 “The gameplay is spot on and anyone with a dark enough sense of humour should give it a go.” - Computer Gaming World 4 out of 5 “So next time you gun down coppers on GTA VI, just remember, Carmageddon’s controversy was there first, and you have a lot to thank it for.” - RetroGarden ABOUT STAINLESS GAMES Stainless was founded in 1994 by Patrick Buckland, a veteran of the games industry going back to the Jurassic period of 1982, and Neil Barnden, who used to have hair like a mammoth. A team of 8 worked on the original Carmageddon at Stainless, and 5 are still with the company today, although a couple of them are now kept manacled in a small padded room in the cellar. Stainless Games now employs well over fifty mad, dedicated people of assorted gender, height and width. They can all be found dangling precariously from a small chalky rock just off the South Coast of England.

You may get an error: 'Sorry, this theme is missing assets for your device's screen size'. Ignore that and apply it anyway and REBOOT. The lock screen and some system dialogs cannot be themed in the T-Mobile Theme Engine, therefore they will remain unchanged. description: Turbo Cross Racing — Race Real 3D Motocross Pods on Alien Worlds TOO YOUNG TO DRIVE — BUT NOT TO FLY You've run away from everything you know for the chance of a lifetime to enter the illegal sport of Turbo Cross Racing. It's an unforgiving sport that pits daredevil pilots in a contest of survival, maximum speed, lightning-fast reflexes, and unflinching nerves. Race a fleet of experimental racing pods through 5 alien worlds filled with dangerous mega-obstacles and nothing-to-lose competitors in order to prove yourself the hottest young pilot in the galaxy. Collect coins and upgrade to faster ships, essential armor, and packs of turbo boost. You're going to need them all if you plan to win — or just survive! FAST-PACED GAMEPLAY - Tilt to steer away from obstacles and competitors - Tilt hard to turn your ship on a dime - Tap the screen to use turbo boost SCI-FI RACING FUN - Stunning 3D graphics - Heart-pumping alien soundtrack - 7 different ships to choose from - 5 increasingly challenging worlds (desert, alien, snow, crystal, and hell) - Watch instant replays of your race FREE TO PLAY Game includes one ship and one world plus 25 turbo boosts to start. Collect coins as you race to purchase additional ships and worlds, or buy coin packs through optional in-app purchase. TRAILER * http://youtu.be/NO6mO4cvNDE FOLLOW US * Facebook.com/SurfCityGames * Twitter.com/SurfCityGames * SurfCityGames.com

One of the biggest collection of Slovakian radios is here !! Slovakia radios brings collection of your favorite radios and FM stations from Slovakia , streaming live on your android devices.Now enjoy listening to the online radio broadcasts and music from Slovakia on your android phones and tablet devices with just tap of a button, no matter where you are. . Best of all, you get to access all this for free !! Radios include, Jemne Melodie Radio Viva Radio Slovensko Fun Radio Live Fun Radio Hokej Fun Radio 80-90.Roky Fun Radio Dance Radio Piestany Radio Kosice Radio GO DeeJay Radio Best Radio SiTy Radio Litera Radio Regina Kosice Fun Radio Love Songs Radio Patrina Radio Kiss sk Radio Lumen Radio FM Radio Fun Czechoslovakia Zahoracke Radio Radio Regina Bratisalava Fun Radio Top 20 Hornet Radio Radio Klasica Radio Hit PS: All the radios streams are live streams and therefore will only be available 24 hours if the radio stations broadcast 24 hours. Those stations that broadcast limited hours will be available only when it is broadcasting live in local time. Radios won't be available for stream when it is offline and occasionally during server maintenance and other downtimes. If the radios are not working or responding please try it again later, these are temporary inactivity.Internet connection is required to stream any radios. Please rate this app and leave any comments or suggestion you may have.

Indian Flights lets you view the status of all flights within india. You can check the status of the flights by Flight Number or by Route. Check flight delays, view arrival and departure times, terminal and gate numbers and more. App also supports multiple zoom-able map styles. Here are the key highlights of this application... FLIGHT STATUS * Check the status of all flights within India * Supports all Indian airports Airports and Airlines * Displays Terminal, Gate & Baggage Claim Information * Provides estimates for Arrival, Takeoff and Landing * Provides information about Flight Delays & Cancellations * Searches flights by Flight Number & Route * Check Flight Status for flights 1 year in advance by flight number MAPS * Zoomable Maps for all flights * Two Map Style options available to choose from * Maps available for individual flights as well as flights between two airports and more... The information displayed in this app is gathered from FlightStats.com which is a very reliable source of information for tracking flights. If you have any feedback/suggestions/issues, please email us at support@touchmeme.com .

Are you a book lover? You have a library at home and you want a suitable tool to manage it with effectiveness? Do you want to have a complete list of your books in your mobile in order to find a title easily? Then, this app is for you! That’s what you can do with it: - You can add a book by means of several characteristics: title, UPC/ISBN, category, rating, description, author, bar code. - So, you can search your books of sort it with the same characteristics. - This app is connected with several providers, so it’s linked to a database. So, when you scan your DVD, the forms will be filling in automatically. - You can also export your lists in an Excel sheet. - You can create custom items in the reports and manage your drop-downs. - You can translate the app in your language by yourself. - You can bulk scan your books - You can synchronize your list between multiple devices Visit our website for more information: http://www.cameldroid.com In the paid version, there are no ads and you can import a list from an excel sheet

description: Try out Air Waves Lite! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=twig.nguyen.airwaves.lite --- ♪ What does it do? Air Waves is a "one to many" local radio broadcasting service which could be used for many things such as live translations for an audience, a baby monitor or a 2-way intercom/walkie-talkie. Prior to creating this app, we had looked into alternatives. The translation system we needed for Ecclesia Mission Hills church (translation service) was almost $8,000. That included only a transmitting station, microphones and 4 headset devices. With Air Waves, we paid (in $AUD): • wireless N150 router ($60) • $120 for x2 cheap Android phones to test our setup with • $20 for x2 in-ear Sony headphones • $0 to bring your own additional listening device So for $200 we've provided the same service which an $8,000 system would have, except Air Waves is easier to set up and far cheaper if we need more headsets. ♪ How to use it? It doesn't get much simpler than this! • Broadcaster: Click on the microphone to start broadcasting immediately. • Listener: Simply click on the headphone icon and choose the channel (or language) you want. Note: all devices need to be on the same WiFi network. ♪ Advanced usage • Press menu to set your device name • Press menu to enable/disable audio playback via headset (for speaker) ♪ Hardware required • At least 2 Android 4.1+ devices • A router with wireless capabilities (preferably at least N standard) • (optional) Some headphones and/or microphone for better audio quality ♪ Notes I've only tested on a handful of phones, simply because I can't afford to buy every phone in the market. Below are the phones I've personally tested and works with Air Waves: • HTC Droid Incredible 2 • HTC One X • Nexus 4 • Samsung i9000 / S2 / S3 / Note 2 / S 3 Mini / S4 • Sony Xperia X10 mini / Z1 / Z3 / Z5 • Xiaomi Mi 2S • ZTE T12 / Telstra Uno ♪ Some additional advice • Both broadcaster and audience must be on the SAME wireless network. • Each listener will use approximately 20Kbps, so please ensure your broadcasting device can handle the given number of listeners. See below for a detailed breakdown. • There is noticeably less audio latency on Android +4.1 devices as Google has fixed up some audio processing issues and again in Android 6 • If you use a hands free microphone, the microphone used will affect recording quality. (Garbage in = garbage out) • Each broadcasting device has different methods of noise cancellation. Pick the one which works best for you. ♪ Some features on wishlist • automatically reconnect to server • use non-blocking IO ♪ Contact If you have any problems, EMAIL ME! Feel free to try it out and email me your feedback. Don't use reviews/comments as a form of "bug reports".
release_text: v1.5.1: - added ability to run app in portrait mode v1.50: (now has minimum of Android 4.1) - massve code cleanup. hasn't been touched since 2013 - added toolbar so newer Android versions can modify settings - added notification which prevents app from sleeping on newer devices - prevent WiFi from being disabled by power saving - enabled noise cancellation for 4.3+ (Jellybean) devices - fixed threading issues - improved performance - cleaned up icons and menus

description: ► DEMO VERSION - You like it? It brings the space shooter genre into the XXI century. If you are an old space war stager, you should check your reflexes in this shooter again. The organization executes interplanetary law. Humanity begins to explore unknown space. Thanks to alien technology humanity develops even faster ► 2036 – scientists capture an alien signal. The EIA makes contact with the alien civilization ► 2037 – First Contact War with the Xelorians – the aliens are space invaders, modern weaponry and rockets are their diplomacy ► 2038 – examinations of fallen aliens show, that the DNA of the Xelorians was manipulated, so they couldn't control their aggression. ► 2039 – Earth loses part of its planets in the Milky Way. ► 2039 – physicists discover the abilities of alien crystals.
