description: Have your Fedoracoins always with you, in your pocket! You pay by quickly scanning a QR-code. As a merchant, you receive payments reliably and instantly. Fedoracoin Wallet is the first mobile Fedoracoin app, and arguably also the most secure! FEATURES: • No registration, web service or cloud needed! This wallet is de-centralized and peer to peer. • Display of Fedoracoin amount in TIPS and kTIPS. • Conversion to and from national currencies. • Sending and receiving of Fedoracoin via NFC, QR-codes or Fedoracoin URLs. • Address book for regularly used Fedoracoin addresses. • When you're offline, you can still pay via Bluetooth. • System notification for received coins. • App widget for Fedoracoin balance. You can find more about Fedoracoin at http://fedoraco.in If you want to contribute to Fedoracoin Wallet, the project is located at https://github.com/denwaotoko/fedoracoin-wallet-new This is a fork of the popular Bitcoin Wallet by Andreas Schildbach and was converted to Dogecoin by me. Find the original at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.schildbach.wallet Bugs are tracked on the github project above. If you have problems, feel free to submit or comment on bugs there! License: GPLv3 Use at your own risk! There is NO WARRANTY. http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html

Skyscanner compares millions of flights across hundreds of airlines- putting the world’s top travel deals at your fingertips. It’s quick and easy to find cheap flights with Skyscanner- the world’s top flight comparison app. With over 35 million downloads so far, our app is a must have for the savvy world traveller. Skyscanner saves you money- whether you’re looking for the cheapest flights for your summer holiday, or last minute flights for a spontaneous getaway. It only takes a few seconds to search for flights using Skyscanner. Our comprehensive flight checker includes high end flag carriers, charter flights, and the best of the budget airlines- giving you the greatest choice when it comes to cheap flights. Need to buy flight tickets on the go? With our app you can search for and book flights instantly from your smartphone. We show you the flights and when you’re ready to book we send you a direct link to the airline or travel agent. With Skyscanner there are no added fees- just cheap flights. No travel destination in mind? No problem. Our unique ‘Everywhere’ search function offers instant flight inspiration. Tell us when you want to fly and where you want to fly from, and we’ll do the rest. Our flight finder shows a list of available flights from your airport to destinations across the globe. Fast, flexible and free, there’s no doubt about it- Skyscanner is the best way to compare flights and get great travel deals, wherever you are. Features: ‘Everywhere’ search –Instant travel inspiration with a list of the cheapest flights from your nearest airport Filter results by price, cabin class, airline, and take-off and landing times Chart view: see prices across a whole week or month to find the best flight deals Available in over 30 languages Create a handy widget to display the latest flight prices for your previous searches

This is an educational game that allows you to learn the Germany map as if you play a jigsaw puzzle. This game is designed to be simple yet fun to play. Not only people who like the map, but also who are not good at geography can enjoy playing it. The app is best suited for people who want to learn the Germany map or students who want to get ready for the exams. Or why don't you try this game to stay sharp during your spare time? You can improve your knowledge as you play the game aiming for the best time or compete against players from all over the world. You can also collect picture panels when you satisfy certain conditions. So do your best to get all of them. There are various modes available, including a [Beginner] mode with the state names and boundaries, a [Expert] mode testing only state names, and an [Master] mode without hints. When you're stuck on finding the location of a state, use the [Assist] function. It will help you to navigate the correct location without hassling yourself. However you will be added a 30 seconds penalty when you use the [Assist] function. If you want to achieve a higher ranking, it'd better not to use this function. *Support tablet.

This application is open source software for quick and easy installation of the operating system (OS) GNU/Linux on your Android device. The application creates a disk image on a flash card, mounts it and installs an OS distribution. Applications of the new system are run in a chroot environment and working together with the Android platform. All changes made on the device are reversible, i.e. the application and components can be removed completely. Installation of a distribution is done by downloading files from official mirrors online over the internet. The application requires superuser rights (ROOT). The program supports multi language interface. You can manage the process of installing the OS, and after installation, you can start and stop services of the new system (there is support for running your scripts) through the UI. The installation process is reported as text in the main application window. During the installation, the program will adjust the environment, which includes the base system, SSH server, VNC server and desktop environment. The program interface can also manage SSH and VNC settings. Installing a new operating system takes about 30 minutes. The recommended minimum size of a disk image is 1024 MB (with LXDE), and without a GUI - 512 MB. When you install Linux on the flash card with the FAT32 file system, the image size should not exceed 4095 MB! After the initial setup the default password for SSH and VNC is changeme. The password can be changed through standard OS tools. FEATURES: Supported distributions: Debian, Ubuntu, Kali Linux, Arch Linux, Fedora, CentOS, Gentoo, openSUSE, Slackware, RootFS (tgz, tbz2, txz) Installation type: file, partition, RAM, directory Supported file systems: ext2, ext3, ext4 Supported architectures: ARM, ARM64, x86, x86_64, emulation mode (ARM ~ x86) Control interface: Android terminal, SSH, VNC, X server, framebuffer Desktop environment: XTerm, LXDE, Xfce, GNOME, KDE, other (manual configuration) Supported languages: English, Russian, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Chinese, Vietnamese, Slovak, Portuguese The latest version of Linux Deploy requires compatible BusyBox: https://github.com/meefik/busybox/releases https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.meefik.busybox NOTICE: Instructions and guides: https://github.com/meefik/linuxdeploy/wiki Ask questions on the forum: http://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=378043 Previous versions: https://github.com/meefik/linuxdeploy/releases Donations: http://meefik.ru/donate/ ATTENTION! This program comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY. This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under license GPLv3.
release_text: Fixed apt resolve in stretch and xenial Added support kali-rolling in Kali Linux Added target type "Auto" for manual prepare target path Added timestamp support to log filename (${TIMESTAMP} variable) End of support Debian Squeeze and Kali Moto

description: Simple, intuitive SSH tunneling application with automatic reconnection after internet connectivity problems and with automatic start up after the device is turned on. NOTE: If you like this application and want to support it's developers consider the paid version 'SSH Autotunnel Pro', which is actively developed, supported and opened for new feature requests. Also please report any bugs to my email instead of user reviews so that I can ask for additional details and have the problem fixed. This application can create secure tunnels using a SSH connection for the user to access services available only from the target machine. For example user can connect to the company server and then use web browser to connect to internal web site of their company, use remote desktop to connect remotely to their office PC desktop and control it from their Android device, or bypass a firewall restriction in their hotel or company by connecting to Internet pages from the remote machine. The application uses standard SSH protocol, without the need to configure and setup a VPN. The only information the user needs to know is the login information to the remote machine and IP/port information of the service they want to connect to. Once the SSH tunnel has been established, the user can connect to the specified local port to access the network service on the remote side using the same application they normally use when their device is connected to that network. The local port need not have the same port number as the remote port. SSH Autotunnel is better than connectbot at recovering from network disconnects. It also consumes less power because it does only one thing and does not emulate any terminal. Ssh Autotunnel is using JSch and Bouncycastle projects, which are under BSD and MIT licenses --------------------------- USER GUIDE: You put public address of as a server that is entry point to the intranet. Use username@ip[:port] (you can use hostname instead of ip of course and you can use different port than 22). Then use either password or ssh key (or both in which case ssh key is expected to be encrypted with the given password). Then on the menu you can add forwardings. You can have as much forwarding for one connection as you want. You need to specify local port, host and remote port. You can also select if this is local or remote forwarding. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Port_forwarding for more details on port forwarding. Also note that this application doesn't support any kind of SOCKS proxy. The application supports both types of private keys - those generated by putty's keygen (ppk) and also the open ssh keys (Linux format). Just copy/paste the content of the key file to the appropriate text box or enter path to the file location on the Android device (e.g. /sdcard/id_rsa.pub). If you experience connection issues and are sure your password is correct, try reexporting your key using a certified tool (such as puttygen) and use the exported key with SSH Autotunnel since some tools do not generate proper OpenSSH format keys. Also check with your ssh server administrator about server logs.

La section réalité augmentée vous permettra d'accéder à du contenu vidéo exclusif, tandis que le photomaton vous offrira la possibilité de vous prendre en photo avec des éléments thématiques du label Wati-B.

An accurate fullscreen clock, inspired by professional LED clocks from the 1970s, which are still used today in radio stations, plane cockpits and trains. Useful when every second counts, or as a stylish, unobtrusive nightstand clock. Shows 24 hour time (no AM / PM). I'm researching ways to implement a widget. Please be patient. (Refreshing widgets every second and in perfect precision is not easy, unfortunately)
release_text: - Bug fix (background was brown instead of black on some devices)

description: New version available here : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fr.pixelprose.dice Yams is and well known dice game played with 5 dices. As for Yahtzee, Yatzy and Yacht the object of the game is to score the most points by rolling five dice to make certain combinations. - Different rules - Pass the phone - Multiple Yatzy - Scoreboard - Resume game - Shake to roll - Online scoreboard Looking for translators : chineese, dutch, italian, spanish, japanese, russian.

Shelly will rip a new one into you. She is your intelligent personal assistant who wont think twice about calling you an idiot. Shelly is an super intelligent digital personality that uses a natural language user interface to answer questions, make recommendations about life and love, and turn on you at any moment. Insult her, and she will lash out at you with vengeance! Anger her, and she will tear your heart out! Try to ignore her, and she will cut off your man parts!

Made for kids! Simple and fun drag racing game. Choose your ride and guide it to the finish line! Switch the gears at the perfect moment to gain the best speed and finish first. This game is easy enough to be played by children but top levels can be challenging as levels gets harder and harder! Sounds: cottonmouth - timeshift DOCTOR VOX - Frontier SDDx - Inspiration freesfx.co.uk

Destroy all the bricks to pass phase and enjoy the spectacular visual effects in this clone of the famous game Brick Breaker were so popular in the 70's and 80's and that you can carry in your pocket everywhere. There are two control modes ball: Classic, where the bounce angle depends on the point of impact on the racket (steeper as more far from the center) and Demolition, where the bounce angle depends on the angle of incidence and the movement of the racket. DEMOLITION currently consists of 400 levels but will be adding more. To overcome them you will have various aids, although sometimes they can hinder you work, as can be changes in the size of the racket or the speed of the balls multiplier balls, barrier, fireballs, gravity, change visibility bricks ... You also have a limited number of wildcards or 'jokers' to skip levels that can not be able to complete. Apart from this you are just you and your skill. Good luck!
release_text: V 1.7.5 - Fifty new levels (500 in total).

Dog sounds for fun for kids, adults, dogs, cats. Handy Application for controlling dogs and cats with Variety of Dog Sounds like Typical Dog Barks, Dogs in Fight, Dog Chasing and imitating Cats, Dog Chasing and imitating Babies kinds of sounds. Also included are sounds like Dog Crying, Dogs being happy. Specialty Dog sounds like Dog imitating Cat sounds and Dog imitating Babies are unique only for this dog sounds app. If you are into Dog Training this app suits very well with all the available Dog Sounds in the app. Dog Trainer's best friend and great teaser for dogs and cats. One of the Best Animal Sounds application. The best Dog Soundboard application with highest downloads. If you need pet sounds, this is the app for you. Each of the dog sounds can you used for dog training similar to how Dog whistle can be used by dog trainers. Great Companion for pet owners along with Dog Whistle.
release_text: Now with more sounds. Only app with 30 Dog sounds and Barks. Improved Icons and support for Android 4.x. Improved In-app purchase capability.

description: Study on the go with Kaka Flashcards 2! FREE forever! Great for learning languages, preparing for tests etc. Features: * Two way sync with Quizlet.com * Supports images in Quizlet's sets * Uses learning system based on Leitner's method * Edit and create new sets on your phone * Simple to use & with nice UI

A Baby Dinosaur’s T-Rex and Caveman Escape Fun for Kids - Try it Today! Baby Dino Run is an action packed kids game where you help Buddy the Baby Dino Run, Jump and Fly to Escape Evil T-Rex and Hungry Cavemen looking for a snack and reach the safety of his Mom. Bring some Fun Jurassic style jam packed action to your Android phone. Baby Dino Run games is fun for everyone and guaranteed to bring you hours of fun.Help Buddy the Baby Dino Run, roll, fly and have some fun. Let Buddy the Baby Dino run and roam free by jumping over obstacles and rolling through the troubles and reach its friends. Baby Dinosaurs are waiting for their mom so hurry and download this Baby Dino animal game. Tap screen to jump and fly over obstacles in the Buddy the Baby Dino game. Buddy the Baby Dino Run is an addictive Baby Dinosaur game. We have created several levels for extended fun. Challenge your friends and see who reaches the top level fast. Buddy the Baby Dino Run Needs Your Help. This is no pet shop or petting Zoo, the Jungle is full of hungry animals and a group of Cavemen hunters trying to capture their favorite snack. Behind every bush is a beastie, even an angry T-Rex. Help Buddy explore and collect Candy and Treasures along the way. To survive the hungry animals Buddy the Baby Dino has to run, jump and bounce out of danger. Features:- Controls so simple a 2 year old can play- Cute playable Baby Dinosaur character - Find powerups for free along the way. - Under 50 megabytes so download it anywhere, anytime!- Tablet support!

Fact is, all lies, all evil deeds, they stink. This ain't no bank robbery! Yes,But there's a story behind: His wife is being held hostage by an extortionist who demands him a Bank Robbery. And he has planned the perfect bank robbery to save his loved one but unaware of the army of police surrounding the bank.Now on the run from police he is desperately in need of your help and ready to pay you for every cop you shoot down. Help him save his wife and make your bank balance. Features: >40 levels on 10 different locations. >Buy, sell and upgrade guns like Revolver,Rifles, light Machine Gun, Heavy Machine Gun, Sniper Gun, Grenade Launcher and many more. >Buy SharpShooters for your support >20+ different Police vehicles and helicopters >Realistic physics >Beautiful 3D Graphics >Explosion and Blast effects

The objective of the game is to help Ron to reach Mia within the defined target. But beware of the in-between obstacles as finding your true love is not easy. description: Officially licensed Tennessee Volunteers Live Wallpaper, with animated 3D logo. Background animation that fades from "Tennessee" logo to "Go Vols." The Settings button lets you customize your live wallpaper with several options, including: where the logo should be on the page, on which pages the logo should appear, and how fast the logo animates. This live wallpaper also works with the Tennessee Clock Widget (sold separately). Instructions: (1)After downloading, go to Menu > Notifications to install; (2) Go to Menu > Wallpaper > Live Wallpaper. Tap “Settings” to customize the look and performance.
release_text: - Fixed bug causing licensing message error when you have no Internet connection - Updated to fit larger screen devices, including 7" and 10" tablets. - Compatible with OS 4.x series devices. - Use Settings menu to change options, including: 6 different background images, logo location, background text, and change frame rate to conserve battery life.

description: Die App PillReminder - Denk an mich für Ihre Erinnerung an die Pilleneinnahme. Sie denkt mit, ist einfach zu bedienen, bietet einen schnellen Überblick und viele individuelle Einstellungsmöglichkeiten. Auf dem Startbildschirm der App haben Sie immer alle wichtigen Informationen schnell im Blick: - Alle Pillen bisher eingenommen? - Pille vergessen - was nun? - Nächste Einnahmezeit der Pille? Der PillReminder - Denk an mich bietet viele individuelle Funktionen: - Tägliche Erinnerung an die Pilleneinnahme mit frei wählbarer Erinnerungszeit - Rechtzeitige Erinnerung an eine neue Pillenpackung - Kalender und Tagebuch mit Infos über Zyklusverlauf, Regelbeschwerden, Tagesstimmung und Intimtage - Ratgeber für Sie, falls Sie eine Pille vergessen haben sollten - Die App beachtet aber auch Ihre einnahmefreien Tage und macht Erinnerungspause! Lassen Sie sich bei der regelmäßigen Pilleneinnahme unterstützen und haben Sie Ihren Zyklusverlauf im Griff. Nach Installation der App werden Sie bequem durch die Einstellungsschritte geführt. Sie können die App sofort nutzen, auch wenn Sie die Pillenpackung bereits angefangen haben. Weitere Informationen rund um die Verhütung finden Sie auf der Webseite http://www.frau-und-pille.de . The app PillReminder -. Remember me for your reminder of the pill She thinks, is easy to use, provides a quick overview and many individual Settings. On the home screen of the app, you have all your important Information quickly at a glance: - All pills have been taken? Forgot pill - - what now? - Next time taking the pill? The PillReminder - Think of me has many individual features - Daily reminder of the pill with selectable alarm time - Timely reminder of a new pill pack - Calendar and diary with information on course of the cycle, menstrual complaints, daily mood and intimate days - Guide for you if you forget a pill - But the app also noted your tablet-free days and makes memories break! Get the regular pill and you have to support your Course of the cycle under control. After installing the app, you will be comfortable with the Setting out steps. You can use the app immediately, even if you pack the pill have already begun. For more information about the prevention, visit the website http://www.frau-und-pille.de .

PC에서도, 스마트폰에서도 네이버 가계부 이용하세요. ∙ 은행내역, 체크카드/신용카드승인 문자를 자동 입력! ∙ 식비인지 교통비인지 분류까지 자동으로! ∙ 분류별 지출/수입, 카드/현금 그래프를 한눈에! ∙ 가로전환하면 1년의 흐름을 한번에! ∙ 통장을 통한 손쉬운 자산관리! 1. 손쉽고 빠른 등록 v 신용카드/체크카드를 쓰면 휴대폰으로 받은 문자 내역을 자동으로 입력 v 시중은행 거래내역 SMS, MMS도 이제 자동입력 v 사용내역을 통한 분류 자동맵핑 v ‘빠른쓰기’로 여러 건의 현금 사용내역을 한꺼번에 입력가능 v 자동등록이 싫다면, 수신된 문자 리스트를 검토한 후에 선택하여 등록! 2. 한달보기/일년보기: 한 눈에 확인하는 현황 v 요약화면으로 지출/수입/잔액을 한 눈에 v 일년보기를 통한 월별 추이 확인 3. 통계 : 직관적이고 예쁜 그래프 v 가로 전환시 1년치 추이 그래프가 한 눈에! v 통장 잔액 및 전체 자산의 현황을 한 눈에! v 월별 분류별 수입/지출 확인 v 카드/현금 지출 비중 및 통장/카드별 지출금액 확인 4. 손쉬운 자산관리 가능 v ‘통장관리 사용’을 통한 통장 별 잔액 관리 v ‘저축/보험’ 분류를 통한 용돈기입장으로도 사용가능 v 통계를 통해 현재의 자산현황과 흐름 파악 가능 앱 사용 중에 문제 또는 오류가 발생하는 경우 네이버 고객센터 (m.help.naver.com/mail.nhn)로 문의를 남겨 주세요. 리뷰에만 의견을 남기실 경우 고객님 문제에 대한 정확한 확인 및 답변이 어렵습니다. description: SPECIAL OFFER, LIMITED TIME REDUCED PRICE!!! Enjoy clearing the levels and get the highest score placing the listed parts properly and completing the lines. These can be single, double, triple and even quadruple. Every time you manage to make 4 lines at once, you obtain "ZipTrix" and you get a special bonus after completing the level. Each level requires a certain number of lines to be completed. As you progress, the difficulty increases gradually and will appear various obstacles, like previously placed pieces, horizontal bars, blocks, etc. The controls are pretty simple: left, right, turn the piece and fast fall. Virtual buttons appear at the bottom of the screen corresponding to those controls.

ISS Tracker is a simple tracker which shows the ground trace of the International Space Station (ISS) using a TLE provided by NASA. The app allows you to see the longitude and latitude of the ISS as well as the the route that it will be traveling in the next 90 minutes.
release_text: Enhanced compatibility for various screen sizes. Bug fix for countries which have a different decimal point.

description: "Red Wasp has produced perhaps the most interesting iPad advent calendar ever." - DigitallyDownloaded.net 'App of the Week' - nineoverten.com "The artwork really does stand out and would make even Cthulhu proud. It is a nice gift to be presented with the vibrant and high-quality art each day. I loved how well Red Wasp Design was able to merge a holiday theme with the likes of Cthulhu and Nyarlathotep." - vividgamer.com The Cthulhu Christmas Calendar is an advent app that counts down to Christmas but with a Cyclopean twist! Each day features an original image which is unlocked in the December count down to Christmas. The original artwork does indeed feature well-loved festive imagery you might expect such as Santa, mistletoe, Christmas trees and the like but these have been merged, mutated, mixed and mashed with other, darker figures drawn from H.P. Lovecraft's Cthulhu Mythos. Cthulhu Christmas Calendar is the fun way to count down till the stars are right and presents can be opened from their slumber. As well as great art, each day also has a Cthulhu-related question for you to puzzle over and answer, with the finally tally of right and wrong being delivered on the 25th, when the score will give you your 'Mythos rating'. Keep track of the sleeps until Cthulhu-mass with the Cthulhu Christmas Calendar; don't leave R'lyeh without it!
release_text: Fixed a bug with the app crashing on startup.

description: The perfect companion app for Sprout Social so you can manage your social media anywhere. You must have a Sprout Social account to use this app. All of your favorite Sprout Social features are now available on the go! Engage with your audience, manage team workflow and monitor your brand while on the go. Whether you are behind the counter helping customers or on the tarmac headed to a conference in Vegas, you will have the power to keep your business social. The Android app will put the power of Sprout Social in the palm of your hand, allowing you to: • Manage all of your social feeds from one intuitive application • Complete Social and Brand monitoring from anywhere • Send updates to all of your social networks on the go • Genius strikes at all hours - schedule, draft or queue messages to send at a later time • View reach, clicks and retweets of sent messages • Assign personal or team tasks for follow-up Sprout Social is a social media management tool created to help businesses manage their social media efforts more effectively and efficiently. Sprout Social integrates with multiple social networks where consumers are engaging with businesses and brands. When used with your Sprout Social account, it offers team or individual engagement and publishing tools with in-depth analytics, brand monitoring, competitive insights and social CRM features. Sprout Social is known for its intuitive, easy to use web and mobile platform.
release_text: It is now possible to enable push notifications for Instagram Location searches. We frequently release great new features and fine-tune the app. To ensure you're getting the best experience, we highly recommend keeping the Sprout Social app up-to-date by enabling auto-updates.

biiCADo Touch – Professional 2D CAD app for creating DXF-drawings biiCADo Touch is a professional 2D CAD-application, optimized for use in mobile devices. The intuitive operation and a variety of CAD Tools enable fast and efficient creation of technical drawings in DXF format. Create PDF documents of your drawings and send them directly from biiCADo touch, to share them with others. This version of biiCADo Touch has the full functionality of biiCADo Touch Pro version with the following limitations: - Saving drawings is limited to max. 20 geometric elements - No dropbox support General: • Create 2D CAD drawings • Drawing in Inch and metric units • Import / export of DXF documents via e-mail • Dropbox support (Pro version only) • Organize your DXF- and PDF-documents clearly in project folders • Undo / Redo any number of times Supported geometry elements which can be created and edited: • Point, Line • X-Line, Ray • Polyline, Rectangle, Polygon, Donut, Array • Arc, Circle, Ellipse, Elliptical Arc, Spline • Text, Multiline Text • Hatch, Solid • Create Block, insert Block, Block attributes • Inserting external DXF blocks. Dimensions • Horizontal, Vertical, Aligned • Radius, Diameter • Angular, Coordinates • Tolerance, Leader lines • center marks Edit Drawing: • Power Edit (Access to all element properties) • Grips • Delete, copy, move • Rotate, scale, mirror • Trim, extend • Chamfer, Fillet • Offset Supported fonts: • txt, isocp, romanc, italic, greekc Supported hatch: • Ansi31, Ansi32, Ansi33, Ansi34 • Ansi35, Ansi36, Ansi37, Ansi38 • Solid Tools for precise drawing: • Magnifier • Snaps • Ortho mode, grid view, grid snap Supported Presettings (add, delete, edit): • Layer, Linetype • Text style, dimension style, point style

Работа курьером (пешком, авто и грузовик) через приложение для Android. Ежедневная оплата. Регистрируетесь, читаете памятку курьера и начинаете работать. Мы представлены: — В Москве, Подмосковье и Московской области: Балашихе, Подольске, Королеве, Химках, Люберцах, Электростали, Коломне, Одинцово и Красногорске — Санкт-Петербурге и Ленинградской области — Екатерибнурге и Свердловской областе — Краснодаре и Краснодарском крае. Каждый день наши курьеры доставляют документы, цветы, покупки из интернет-магазинов, товары из супермаркетов и гипермакеторв: Глобус-Гурме, Метро, Икея, Ашан). В Москве и Питере много заказов на доставку с Авито. У нас много вакансий водителей с личным автомобилем. Есть заказы для легковых и для грузовых авто.(седан, Иж-каблук, пикап, хендай-портер, соболь, Мерседес-Спринтер, газель, боксер, форд-транзит, пежо-боксер, Баргузин) Приложение умеет всё, что нужно для успешного поиска работы. Первый заказ станет доступен уже сегодня. Поиск работы завершен! По некоторым заказам оплата будет увеличена при наличии опыта работы по специальностям: кассир, слесарь, кладовщик, грузчик, охранник, офис-менеджер, секретарь, повар, фрилансер, мерченджайзер, промоутер, разнорабочий на стройке, официант, посудомойщик, строитель, механик, таксист, служба в армии, стюард, проводник, водитель, уборщик, дворник, клиринг-менеджер, работник склада, бариста. Мы ценим опыт работы в DHL, грузовичкоф, Газелькин, Uber, Почта России, Деловые Линии, ПЭК, EMS Post, Edostavka (СДЕК), Пони Экспресс, DPD, Fedex, Озон, Аксиомус, Боксберри, Qiwi (киви) Подробнее про требования к вакансии смотрите на HeadHunter, SuperJob (суперджоб), работа.ру или avito в профиле компании Dostavista. Курьер «Достависты» в курсе всех деталей, при этом ему не нужно ничего записывать. Приложение всегда показывает: — адрес и маршрут на карте — плановое время прибытия и телефон клиента. Вакансия курьера «Достависты» это: — ежедневная оплата — работа на полный день или подработка по гибкому графику. Поиск работы курьером теперь проще. Курьеры на полной занятости в Москве зарабатывают 48 000 рублей. Можно работать из подмосковься и области. В Санкт-Петербурге 36 000. В Екатеринбурге 32 000. В Краснодаре 28 000. Приложение само сообщит, когда появится новый заказ. 24 часа в сутки операторы колл-центра работают вместе с курьерами и решают вопросы. Обычно перезванивают через минуту. Приложение помогает нашим курьерам спокойно работать и везде успевать. Основные функции: — обновляет список доступных заказов — отдельно уведомляет о новых заказах — хранит все подробности — определяет местоположение — строит маршрут до следующего адреса — показывает текущий баланс — принимает подпись клиента «пальцем на экране» — фотографирует, когда нельзя получить подпись. Требования к устройству: — Андроид, версия 2.1 и выше — Доступная память: не менее 5МБ. Courier work (on foot, car and truck) through the app for Android. Daily fees. Register, read the memo carrier and start working. Gingerbread Dash! is a new side-scrolling jumping game developed by Ateam Inc. Gameplay consists of helping the Gingerbread Man runaway from the Giant Fox without falling into the water or being caught by other animals. The Gingerbread Man! is controlled by tilting the Android device in the desired direction, with greater tilt equaling greater movement speed. When playing, collect stars to make power items appear that will assist the Gingerbread Man's flight from his dark fate.

• It is a web-based software & service. • It is a personal health and medical care account connected to robust software that manages the health and medical care of individuals and families. Our dream is to create a personal health and medical care account like this for every individual of this world. That will solve many problems related to health and medical care. It is free for anyone. • It allows you to securely communicate day-to-day health records to physicians and family members. Individuals can monitor and track all aspects of health and medical care. • It helps users to analyze and store day-to-day health information. Users: •Individual patients and families •Health insurance companies •Government agencies •Employers Features and benefits: •Helps to manage chronic diseases •Decreases health care cost. •Improves the quality of health care. •Individuals can monitor and track all aspects of health and medical care. •Stores medical records in a secure, web-based, HIPAA-compliant server which can be accessed from anywhere by the patient. •Users can give secure access to physicians and family members from anywhere. •Allows users to manage the health and medical care of their parents or grandparents from remote location. •Access available from any computer and mobile device with internet connection. •Some features are available only from desktop, laptop and tablet PC. Some other features are only available in paid subscription. Visit ConstantMD.com to signup for a free patient account and start using this free app.

CereProc has developed the world's most advanced text to speech technology. Our voices not only sound real, they have character, making them suitable for any application that requires speech output. This voice can synthesize: * Navigation directions from Scout while driving * Accessibility information with Talkback * Twitter, Facebook and newsfeeds with iHearNetwork * Your favourite eBook from eBook reader apps * Your SMS with apps like Handcent SMS or Drive Carefully * and many other TTS-enabled apps Please note that for some applications such as Scout, we recommend installing on a device with at least a 1GHz processor. You can try the Adam voice for yourself, in the interactive demo on CereProc's homepage: http://www.cereproc.com

description: After a night in the exclusive bar, where you were to follow one of those bad apples. It was rumoured that he was employed by the Doctor. Apparently somebody was doing the same nice gesture to you. Except they went a step further. You felt just a little sting on your neck. Immediately you know what it was, but the world slowed down and all of your senses went numb. Now you’ve woken up in a prison cell. In the lair of the Doctor. Use your wit and explore the lair, there might be hope for you after all.

“We, Subway Korea, promise…” - The most accurate subway timetable compared to that of competitors’ - Optimized search function based on ten years of expertise - All-in-one search result (Time consumed / fare / stopping station / transfer time / quick transfer / exit door / toilet and etc.) “All these, available only on Subway Korea!” - Navigation which guides to your final destination, by using “location search”. We provide exit gate information and maps to your destination! Feel free to tell us your opinion whenever you have difficulties using our service! Click this link: subway@malangstudio.com to send us a mail. --------- Detailed description of our service, Subway Korea ------------ Subway Korea, the most beloved subway map application of all time, is now stepping one step forward. Subway Korea offers the official timetable from Seoul Metropolitan Transit Corporation, which means we quickly provide the most accurate station information compared to that of other subway map services. The timetable which varies on weekdays, Saturdays, and holidays…we provide the most exact subway map based on our algorithm, which is the result of 10 years of expertise. Our service, Subway Korea, provides detailed map of stations’ surrounding area and direction to the final destination in major cities: Seoul, Busan, Daejeon, Gwangju, and Daegu. [ The most accurate subway timetable compared to that of competitors’] - Offers the official subway timetable from Metropolitan Transit corporation (However, it may vary under certain circumstances) - Continuous updates on the latest subway timetable - Perfectly supports subway timetable which varies on weekdays, Saturdays, and holidays. - Supports subway timetable of major cities: Seoul, Busan, Daejeon, Gwangju, and Daegu [ Easy and convenient search ] - Easily search the first and last train with just one-touch! - Set your route freely by selecting express/rapid, normal train and the exit you want! - Look through recently searched stations and recent routes - Algorithm which is the result of 10 years of expertise/ [ The first one ever to support “search by location” ] - The first one ever in public transportation navigation category! Provides detailed map of stations’ surrounding area including the exit information - Search the final destination and we’ll tell you the nearest subway station exit around 1km. - Set the final destination in major cities’ subway (including Seoul, Busan, Daejeon, Gwangju, and Daegu) and we’ll tell you the way there including the exit number, all these just in one step! [ Improvements based on user’s experience ] - Provides unbreakable vector-based subway map even if zoomed-in - Improved zoom in/out speed of subway map - Added alarm upon arrival and transfer station alarm function - Improved UI by adopting the “home-screen master button” - The first one ever to adopt social algorithm, which users participate to improve transfer station, transfer time, and exit info. [ Various options to set customized UI ] - Total of 30 different types of subway map and transfer info depending on area, language, and unit. - Ability to set main screen : You can check your bookmarked station and route at the main screen! Another classic Match-3 game launch on Google Play. Your mission is to win Dragon Egg, pass the levels and try to get all stars in each level. How to play: 1: Match 3 or more identical jewels. 2: Match the jewels until the board transparency,the Dragon Egg will appear. 3: Make the Dragon Egg down to last line to pass the level. Tips: Eliminate the jewels quickly can get extra scores. Game Features: Leaderboards in your friends circle and world. Many challenging puzzles to make the game more addictive. More than 260 levels in the game. Match 4 jewels and more can win the super jewel.

A spectacular live wallpaper of storm clouds and lightning, experience a dramatic fully-animated background! Fully supports both landscape and portrait, on either a phone or tablet, with almost no battery drain! Works as a Daydream on 4.2+ devices! If you enjoy this, get the full version for a full settings screen! Customize ambient light color, bolt color, wind speed, bolt frequency, number of clouds, and more! Have colors to change based on time of day, or go retro with minimalist mode! Tap your screen to summon lightning! TO USE: Home->Long Press->Wallpapers

This is the free version of Physics Formula Sheet, to get all the formulas ad free buy the full version of Physics Formula Sheet. The app includes dozens of useful formulas and descriptions of them, along with a comprehensive list of constants and math laws. Physics Formula Sheet makes that tough physics assignment easy, and can be used to help prepare for exams. The app is suitable for all levels of physics from high school to university and beyond. The paid version of this app includes a formula request feature to request that new formulae be added.

Explore the wild savanna and live life as a Lion! Survive in a massive world filled with dangerous animals and crafty critters. Start your own pride of lions, raise baby lion cubs, stalk prey through grassy plains, and battle for your life against fierce predators like crocodiles, cheetahs, and elephants! Download the Safari Simulator: Lion today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time! Game Features + REALISTIC SIMULATOR - You'll need to maintain your health, hunger, thirst, and energy if you're going to survive in the hostile African savanna! + EPIC BATTLES - Use your powerful bite, razor sharp claws, and swift speed to catch tasty snacks and fight dangerous beasts! + START A PRIDE OF LIONS - Find up to three lionesses to bond with and raise your very own family of lions to help you hunt! + LEVEL UP YOUR LION - Gain experience by defeating other animals and level up to increase your health, attack damage, and even unlock new lion furs! + LION SURVIVAL GUIDE - Look to your handy survival guide for information on enemy wildlife, a map of the savanna, lion customizations, and much more! + HUGE 3D ENVIRONMENT - Your lion is free to explore the vast plains of the African savanna filled with dangerous carnivores, tall grass, and a lush oasis! + NEW TOUCH-BASED CONTROLS - Brand intuitive controls let you navigate your animal like never before! Pinch to zoom and play from your lion's perspective or get a bird's eye view of the action! + HD GRAPHICS - Stunning High Definition graphics will transport you to the African wilderness and surround you with nature's vibrant beauty! + GLUTEN-FREE PROMISE - With all of our games you will always get the full game with no ads or additional purchases! Download the Safari Simulator: Lion and rule the Animal Kingdom as a ferocious wild Lion! If you liked living as a Lion then you'll love our other animal simulators! Download Jurassic World: Tyrannosaurus Rex Simulator to travel to a lost land of dinosaurs or check out the Wildlife Simulator: Wolf and start your very own Wolfpack! Follow us on Facebook for more awesome animal games and simulators! facebook.com/glutenfreegames Follow us on Twitter too! We love hearing feedback and suggestions! twitter.com/glutenfreegames

Imagine the magical island floating above the dark waters of a rocky bay somewhere on a distant planet. Although it seems to be cold out there, the island seems to be full of live, carrying a huge city on top. Spot lights are searching for something on the surface of the water, maybe it's a small boat that they are looking for. Engines are glowing rythmically, as if the island is about to fly away. Judging by the clouds running fast on the sky, wind must be very strong. From time to time a sentry ship passes by, guarding the surroundings of the island. And everything under the cold light of a lonely moon. Where is that land? Might be right on Your smartphone's/tablet's homescreen. Hope You'll enjoy it!

description: There are many grocery apps in the app store, so whate makes our app different? Why should you use it? Our Grocery Organizer lets you: - quickly setup daily shopping lists. - transfer lists by bluetooth between members of the family who also own the app. - edit products' name picture and measurement, so they describe more accurately what you actually want to buy. - add new products if the ones you want are not present in the app. - start a "buy session", so you can check all the stuff that is already bought and know what else is left to buy. If some one like translate application labels in his own language, s/he is welcome. Just send e-mail to our support e-mail, we will send you the instructions and XLS file with all labels In the upcoming updates you will be able to send lists wherever your partner is via internet. He or she will be also sent push notification so even if their app is not running they will know they have a new list to do.

The Skyscape Medical Library (SML) app is the only decision-support tool for Physicians, Nurses, Students and Healthcare Professionals with over 400 resources/titles from leading Publishers, Authors and Medical Societies. Originally released over 20 years ago as a first mHealth tool of its kind, over its lifetime it has been trusted by more than 2.6 million Healthcare Professionals (HCPs) to access the medical resources they know and trust at the point of care. ** This enhanced app being released by the Skyscape Medpresso team, the same founders that conceived the original innovation and nurtured its development with passion and care. We are pleased to release our labor of love to the healthcare community. ** INCLUDED FOR FREE • Skyscape Rx: Comprehensive information on thousands of brands and generics, with interactions (including multi-drug analyzer tool) and over 400 integrated dosing calculators. • Skyscape Clinical Calculator: Medical calculator with more than 200 interactive tools, organized by specialty. • Skyscape Clinical Consult: Evidence-based clinical information on hundreds of diseases and symptom-related topics, presented in convenient outline format. • Skyscape MedBeats™ - news and information tailored to your specialty EVERYTHING YOU NEED IN ONE APP Skyscape has partnered with more than 35 respected publishers and content providers to offer more than 400 virtual “greatest hits” of the most trusted medical resources, regularly updated to ensure you have the most current information at your fingertips. Popular premium resources include: • 5-Minute Clinical Consult (5MCC) • Diseases and Disorders: A Nursing Therapeutics Manual • Davis’s Drug Guide for Nurses • Rosen and Barkin's 5 Minute Emergency Medicine Consult • Taber's Cyclopedic Medical Dictionary • Netter’s Atlas of Human Anatomy • Fitzpatrick's Color Atlas and Synopsis of Clinical Dermatology • The Merck Manual of Diagnosis and Therapy • Journal Watch PATENTED POWERFUL TOOLS TURN INFORMATION INTO ACTION AT THE POINT OF CARE • SmartLink™ – Empowers your natural thought process by cross-referencing all resources in your personal library, from initial patient interaction to diagnosing, treating and prescribing. • Content Updates – Skyscape resources are continuously updated so you can be confident that you have the most up-to-date information. • SmartSearch™ – Patented dynamic search finds the information you need, even when you don’t know where to look. • Audio pronunciations of medical terms • Integrated Calculators – Power on-screen calculations directly from your research topic. • Flowcharts – Transform complex algorithms and protocols from static images into dynamic step-by-step decision support tools. • Full Color Images – Bring conditions to life and incorporate clickable “hotspots” to identify structures. • Signs & Symptoms Index – Matches a comprehensive checklist of symptoms with possible diagnoses. CUSTOMER SUPPORT Skyscape customer support is always available to help get you up and running, available by email or phone (see Skyscape.com/support).

Эта развивающая игра поможет ребенку выучить детские стихи А. Барто. Послушайте и выучите эти знакомые всем с детства стихи вместе со своим малышом. Простая в использовании игра позволит ребенку самому выбирать и прослушивать стихи. С помощью нашего приложения Ваш ребенок уже через несколько дней будет рассказывать Вам стихотворения. Все стихи озвучены детским голосом, что в большей степени заинтересует и привлечет внимание ребенка и способствует лучшему усвоению материала. Все стихотворения сопровождаются красочными картинками. Вы можете бесплатно самостоятельно отключить рекламу. Вы можете сами почитать ребенку стихотворения. В нашем приложение ребенок может выучить следующие детские стихи: -Мишка -Бычок -Лошадка -Грузовик -Мячик -Зайка -Козленок -Кораблик -Слон -Самолет -Лягушата -Фонарик -Котенок -Мой пес -Раковина -Воробей. Художественная литература является одним из традиционных способов развития умственных способностей малыша. Дети с огромным удовольствием слушают стихи благодаря их ритму и мелодичности. Даже двухмесячные малыши реагируют на знакомый стишок улыбкой. Детские стихи полезны как для умственного развития ребенка, так и для эмоционального.С помощью простых стишков, ребенок постепенно готовится к восприятию более сложной литературы. Заучивание стихотворений тренирует и развивает мозг малыша. Дети дошкольного возраста вслушиваются в стихотворные тексты, благодаря чему узнают, что слова могут обладать одинаковым звучанием, но иметь абсолютно разное значение. Обороты стихотворения остаются в памяти ребенка и развивают его лексикон.Кроме того, заучивание стихов расширяет кругозор ребенка, улучшает речь и способствует формированию культуры. А самое главное – развивает память. This educational game will help your child learn nursery rhymes A. Barto. Listen and learn all these familiar from childhood poems with his baby. Easy to use game allows your child to choose and listen to poetry.    With our app your child in a few days will tell you a poem.    All the poems sounded childish voice that more interest and attract the attention of the child and promotes better assimilation of the material.     All poems are accompanied by colorful pictures.     You can free yourself disable ads.     You can make your own child to read a poem.     In our application, the child can learn the following nursery rhymes: -Mishka -Bychok -Loshadka -Gruzovik -Myachik -Zayka -Kozlenok -Korablik -Slon -Samolet -Lyagushata -Fonarik -Kotenok -My Dog -Rakovina -Vorobey.     Fiction is one of the traditional ways of development of mental faculties baby. Children with great pleasure to listen to poetry because of their rhythm and melody. Even two months kids react to a familiar poem smile.     Nursery rhymes are useful both for the child's mental development, and for emotsionalnogo.S simple rhymes, children gradually prepared to accept more challenging literature. Memorizing poems trains and develops the brain of the baby.     Preschool children listen attentively to the poetic texts, so that they will know that words can have the same sound, but have completely different meanings. Turnovers poems remain in the memory of the child and develop his leksikon.Krome of learning poems broadens the mind of the child, improves speech and fosters a culture. And most importantly - develops memory.

MicroCells is a highly enjoyable game. Once you start, you won’t want to stop. The goal of the game is to clear the field from cute microbes. Try it, and see how high you can score. You have to group six or more microbes of the same color together. Once the microbes are grouped, your score increases, and the grouped microbes disappear to make room for more maneuvers. After each turn, Android puts more microbes on the board and your task becomes more difficult. The game is over when the board completely fills up. Enjoy the game!

description: 独り遊び２９種類を集めた、UNDO付きのトランプゲーム集です。 ハイスコアランキングに参加する事が出来ます。 メニューより選択してください。 A collection of 29 types alone play, it is a collection of card games with UNDO. It is possible to join the high score ranking. Please select from the menu.

Are you in shape? Fitness Check Up is the app you need to do a fun and enjoyable check-up! The Fitness Checkup application helps you assess your physical shape using 11 health tests: Flexibility, Balance, Body Core, Strength, Capacity for effort, Muscle Tone, Explosiveness, Pulse at rest, Body mass index, Body fat index and Reaction speed. With these 11 tests, your health score can be restored. It comes with advice and exercises to improve your health to where it should be! This is a preventive health approach, so check your health parameters regularly and do our exercises to improve your physical shape. Earn rewards and share with your friends. Characteristics of the Fitness Checkup application: - 11 simple and useful health tests (flexibility, balance, abs) - Clear images and concise explanations to help you do the tests - Personalized advice to help you obtain your health assessment - Exercises to improve your physical shape - Records of your results to help you follow your progress everyday - Overview Fitness Checkup to know your health score - Health rewards to motivate you and help you progress - Webcam pulse measurement for the Cardio and Effort tests! - Share your scores and rewards - Manage your health profile The Cardio and Effort tests of the Fitness Checkup application measure your heart rate thanks to an innovative process using your Smartphone camera as a heart rate monitor! For these 2 tests, you will see your real-time heart rhythm displayed! The application works with telephones possessing a flash. We keep improving our applications all the time. Do not hesitate to contact us! Your opinions interest us. Wake it Up, Shake it Up !

Block Mania is a fun puzzle game. Move the red block to red box, yellow block to yellow box, etc. It looks easy. However, it is not easy as you thought. Finish the goal wthin the specified moves.The less moves used, the more stars will be earn. FEATURES: - Easy operate - Up to 72 levels - Blocks with different color - Fun elements: like time tunnel, gas which change block's color - More levels are coming soon

Aries ( 21 Maret - 19 April ) Elemen : Api Aries adalah yang pertama dari para zodiak . Orang yang lahir di bawah tanda ini sangat memproyeksikan kepribadian mereka ke orang lain dan bisa sangat berorientasi diri. Mereka adalah independen, murah hati, optimis, sabar, mudah marah Bagi aries, hidup itu seperti pertempuran untuk dimasukkan ke dalam dan menang. Aplikasi ini berisi fakta fakta seputar aries yang diupdate setiap harinya Berbagi fakta-fakta ini di Facebook, kirim email atau SMS ke teman Anda! Nikmati! Aries (March 21-April 19) Element: Fire Aries is the first of the zodiac. People born under this sign are very projecting their personalities to other people and can be very self-oriented. They are independent, generous, optimistic, impatient, irritable For Aries, life is like a battle to put in and won. This application contains the facts about aries is updated every day Share these facts on Facebook, send an email or SMS to your friends! Enjoy!

Change the look and feel of the BIG Launcher with this theme. This theme was inspired by project Kennedy. It is a code name for the graphics style of the recent Google products, including Chrome and Google+. This isn't an official Google product. * This theme can be used with the latest version of BIG Launcher ( http://bit.ly/BIGLauncher ) or BIG Launcher FREE DEMO ( http://bit.ly/BIGLauncherFREE ). This is not a standalone app. * Themes can be memory intensive, do not use them on a low-end devices! * To apply the theme, go to the Preferences -> Appearance -> Select theme * To use custom icons, go to the Preferences -> Customize buttons and screens. If the theme is active, you can choose from the Internal icons as well as from the theme icons themselves. * Watch the video tutorials or read the user manual at our website http://biglauncher.com Feel free to contact us ( contact@biglauncher.com ) in case of any problems. Thank you! Some of the icons used under CC license - Cornmanthe3rd ( http://cornmanthe3rd.deviantart.com )

description: A very simple countdown timer. Its raison d'être is ease of use - only one click to start the timer. Long-press the buttons to edit the times. Options->Setting for vibrate, volume etc. Useful for many activities: meditation, exercise, etc. Update: Should fix sleep-related bugs. Donations welcome (press menu in app)! :-)

Featured File Manager & WIFI File Explorer! Share your music, video or documents between your phone and computers! Transfer and view files, music, photos, and videos in two ways: by the local file manager, or from a ftp client in your computer. "SD Card File Explorer" will make your phone as a FTP Host, which will make you share your MP3, MP4 or documents between your computer and phone easily! The lightest, fastest FTP server that allows you to connect to your phone over wifi to upload and download files. Any FTP client on your computer can be used. Tiny size (smallest file manager on market), but with much more great features than you expect!

Download the Skogman Realty app and discover a variety of different search options and filters, making it easier than ever to search for homes on-the-go in a variety of areas servicing Cedar Rapids and the surrounding areas. Areas of expertise include the following: Corridor, Cedar Rapids, and Iowa City. ________ Version 3 has arrived! We reviewed your feedback and vigorously tested to come up with our best release to date. We improved our back-end system to make searching for your next dream home easier and faster than ever. Next, we simplified our design and created a layout optimized for your home searching experience. Upgrades to the new version includes: Map Pins: Consistent with the new web map search, we color coded the map pins based on property status. Map Callout: Redesigned this to highlight property photos and maintain consistency with our list view. POI Data: Added in the ability to see places of interest while you search for your next home. List View: Updated the look of our list view page to highlight property photos. We also added the ability to lazy load property results as the users scrolls down the list. Property Details: Redesigned this page to achieve a cleaner look including a reorganization of the property’s features. Help Menu: Created a more descriptive and fluent help menu for our apps. We have also added helpful suggestions within the app as the user navigates around. Account/Menu: Restructured this section to focus more on the user’s account information. This set up will allow us to easily add and upgrade features with future updates. Agent Branding: It is easier than ever to brand the app to your favorite agent.

description: 스터디스크린은 효과만점 단어 암기 어플이에요. 머니투데이에 소개된 스터디스크린! http://www.mt.co.kr/view/mtview.php?type=1&no=2014021316554733429&outlink=1 단어앱을 바로 켜기까지 우리를 유혹하는 스마트폰앱과 게임이 너무 많아요. 의지를 가지고 단어앱을 실행해서도 단순한 문제풀이 때문에 조금 사용하다보면 금방 지루해져요. 하지만, 스터디 스크린은 다릅니다. 스터디스크린은 화면을 켜자마자 단어를 학습할 수 있어요. 어썸~!!! 굳히 신경쓰지 않아도, 보려하지 않아도 단어가 노출되어 나도 모르게 단어가 암기가 됩니다. 게다가, 효과적인 복습 관리까지 제공하고 있습니다. 지금 바로 사용해 보세요. [ 스터디스크린 만의 장점 ] * 잠금화면에 단어나 단어풀이를 표시해주어 효과가 높습니다. * 푸시메세지로 매일 매일 새로운 단어를 노출시켜 자신도 모르게 단어가 암기됩니다. * 사전을 내장하고 있어 새로운 단어를 쉽게 추가 / 암기를 할 수 있습니다. * 단어 읽어주기 기능 ( 설정에서 선택 가능 ) - 안드로이드 TTS - 구글 TTS (웹) * 엑셀파일로 사전등록기능 - 페이스북에 스터디스크린에 대한 글을 쓰기만 하면 기능이 활성화됩니다. - 지원하는 엑셀포멧은 xls ( Excel 97-2003통합문서 ) 로 저장하셔야 합니다. - 엑셀파일은 아래와 같고, 아래에 타입중 하나로 단어리스트를 작성하시면 됩니다. 1. 간단형 : 단어, 뜻 2. 일반형1 : 단어, 뜻, 설명 3. 일반형2 : 단어, 발음, 뜻 4. 완성형 : 단어,뜻,발음,설명 ( 완성형은 다음 공개단어장 포멧이므로, 공개단어장을 다운받은 뒤 읽어오실 수 있습니다. ) http://wordbook.daum.net/open/wordbook/list.do?dic_type=endic [ 보너스 기능 ] * 스마트 영어사전 기능을 이용해보세요. 웹검색하다가 모르는 단어가 있을때 복사하기만 하면 뜻이 표시되는 클립보드 사전도 활용해보세요. [ 기본단어장 ] - 초등 필수단어 - 중학교 필수단어 - 고등 필수단어 - 필수 영단어 - 수능 영어 - 토익 영어 - 토플 영어 - SAT 영어 [연관검색어] 스터디스크린, 스크린, 스터디, 푸시영어, 푸시단어장, 영어, 일본어, 영단어, 영어공부 단어장, 잠금화면 단어장, 영어공부, 락스크린, 애드라떼, 캐시슬라이드, 잠금화면 토익, 토익시험, 취준생, 취업준비, 토플, 토익단어, 토익영어, 토플영어, 수능영어, 수능, 토익공부, 토플공부 sat, sat 단어장 개선사항이나 기타 문의사항은 sokum.net@gmail.com 으로 문의바랍니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : 050-7737-3425 Memorizing words out of the study is an effective application's screen. description: Super Battery Bar is an easy to setup unobtrusive battery indicator. By placing a transparent bar over top of your status bar, it is easy to see the current battery percentage. The best part, is it is completely free! Some devices and Android versions don't have a clear indication of battery, which leaves you to guess. Simply downloading Super Battery Bar and enabling it will fix this problem. The default settings are perfect for most users, but further customization can be done depending on your requirements. Features: -Display battery percentage overtop of the bar -Customize the color, size and transparency -Charging color - Different color and options when the device is charging -Widget for easy control

NOW WITH A RETRO LOOK - AN ANIMATED OLD CASSETTE TAPE. YOU CAN CHOSE BETWEEN 5 DIFFERENT CASSETTE TAPES. Simple Media Player can play mp3, ogg and wav files, read ID3 tags and it has all the necessary functions (repeat, shuffle, search, save/load playlists) for a media player, but nothing more, just to keep it simple and user-friendly. It's more like one of those portable mp3 players - simple, straightforward and easy to use. Unlike other media players, with Simple Media Player you can manage your playlist very easy - you just need to navigate to the directory where you keep your mp3, wav and ogg files and select as many mp3 files (or wav or ogg) as you want to add to your playlist. Or you can add all media files found in that directory if you want. And of course, you can save your playlist, create a new one or edit an existing one. Everything in the simplest possible way. You can chose between 2 views - one which will display the playlist and another one which shows an old cassette tape running while the music is playing. This view also has controls on screen. For more info, please visit http://apps4droid.blogspot.com/2011/09/hitamp.html . Also please rate it if you like it. And if you get any errors, or if the application force close, please let me know and I will do my best to fix it. MP3 file icon, OGG file icon, WAV file icon and directory icon designed by Rhor - http://rhor.deviantart.com/ . Application icon designed by Jeremy Sallee - http://salleedesign.com/ . Cassette tape design by fuzzimo.com - http://fuzzimo.com/ Keywords: mp3 player, music player, media player, android music player, folder music player

This is the official mobile application for Apptivo's business management software, which comes included in premium & enterprise plans. Plans start at $10/month. Free 30 day trial included for new users! Get unlimited access to all your contacts, customers, leads, tasks, activities and much more, right from your fingertips. Apptivo’s mobile app stays in sync real time with all of the data on the cloud. In fact you operate on the same data. Access our business apps from anywhere, anytime, on any device. We didn’t want to limit the mobile app in any way, so all of the capabilities you have on the web are available on the mobile app. You can even access your custom attributes from the mobile app. The current version of Apptivo mobile has a common activities area, as well as four CRM apps - Leads, Opportunities, Contacts and Customers. The common activities area helps businesses to clearly segregate their business activities from personal activities in this bring your own device (BYOD) era. You can have your employees use their own devices or access the Apptivo app for their business activities. You can access the following activities globally, across all apps and objects: News feed - Everything that is going on in your business, that you need to know. Keep checking the newsfeed to get the pulse on what is going on in your business. Calendar - All your business appointments. Call Log - Invoke the native phone from your mobile and record notes on all your calls. Tasks - Access a unified list of all your tasks. Complete them, reassign them, keep them updated. Assigned Objects - Access all the objects that are assigned to you. If you own a lead, you will see it here. If you own a Customer, you will see that here. Follow Ups - A subset of your appointments, but most likely your bread and butter appointments. Access all of your follow ups, and keep them updated from the central Activities area or from the individual CRM apps. Emails - Send emails from the mobile app. And look at only the relevant emails. Avoid clutter at work. In addition to the common activities area, Apptivo Mobile v1.0 brings four of our CRM applications to your mobile phone: Leads - Create leads on the go. Access leads that have been assigned to you using the same views that are available on the web based Leads App. Convert your leads to opportunities. Opportunities - Record opportunities when you are meeting your prospect or customer. Take notes, schedule follow ups, and finally, close your deal, all on the go. Contacts - Use our mobile contacts app to access contacts on the go. Since our mobile contacts app operates on the same security layer as our cloud, this can be your most secure contact sharing system. Every employee will only see their own contacts. No complex synchronization processes and no waiting. Customers - Access all the information associated with your customers right here. Everything you need to know about a customer when you walk into a meeting, right from your mobile device. This app is available in Google Play to download for free, but users will need to be on the paid plan in order to use the App. All new users will be able to sign up for the 30-day trial of the Premium Plan. About Apptivo We set out to build business software for small businesses and have built over 40 Apps to help small businesses manage their projects, automate time tracking & invoicing, increase customer engagement using CRM and enhance web presence by employing business website integrations through WordPress & API.

18 fantastic weather widgets in 3 different sizes. Widgets with and without a clock. Widget displays weather forecasts for coming periods, up to a week ahead. Weather forecasts contains details of up to 9 days ahead, and up to 4 periods a day. Weather data are provided by yr.no, and updated several times a day. How often you want to retrieve the latest weather data is up to you. Application supports geo-positioning, and can retrieve the latest weather forecast for your current location. Detailed forecast-information includes temperature, type of weather, wind speed, wind direction, expected rainfall, barometric pressure, sunrise, sunset and the length of day in hours and minutes. With one click, you also have direct access to hour-by-hour graph from yr.no through its pages. All widgets with clock, can also be used as a shortcut to start programs. This saves you space on the desktop. All applications installed on the phone can be started with this feature. New widgets released regularly, and requests for new widgets or features are considered on an ongoing basis. Free access to all future releases. Currently supported languages: Norwegian, Swedish, English, Czech, Dutch, Danish, French, Italian, Russian Some of the available settings: - Widget-background / 50% transparent / completely transparent background - Launcher when clicking on the Clock - Different date and time formats (12H/24H) - Celsius / Fahrenheit - Optional unit for wind speed, altitude and rainfall - Day and night icons - Update automatically, every 3, 6, 12 or 24 hours or manually
release_text: - Fix for Android 4 update - Bugfix for searching for new locations - Minor bug fixes If you experience problems getting latest forecasts, please delete and readd your location. Please open application to make clock widgets start updating after upgrading.

description: With more than 1,500 exercises, iTooch TOEFL™ Prep is a fun way of practicing and preparing the TOEFL™ exam. It covers the speaking, listening, reading and writing sections. It is, by far, the largest collection of questions based on the US National Standards to prepare the TOEFL™ test. Used by more than 5,000,000 users, iTooch apps provide comprehensive learning solutions which help students to identify and address learning needs in a fun and motivating way. * UNIQUE SET OF FEATURES * • A clear, simple and engaging interface to learn with fun • Speech synthesis option to help users in reading and text comprehension • Multi-player management • Font size adjustment to suit everyone’s needs • A virtual blackboard • A lesson summary attached to each chapter • In-app feedback to send suggestions to the author == PEOPLE LOVE US == ‣ "I just downloaded your apps. Wow. They are amazing. I have been using the tablet for over a year in my class and I have to say that this is one if the best apps I have seen in a long time." ‣ "A terrific app that covers a lot of ground concept-wise. This app combines a no-frills approach to content while still providing the user with an exciting learning experience. The mascot is adorable and keeps students on task with lots of encouragement and there is a lesson summary available when needed." == OUR APPLICATION CONTAINS == ‣ 4 themes: Reading, Speaking, Writing, Tips ‣ 50 chapters with lessons, examples, and figures ‣ 1,508 questions with clues, detailed explanations ‣ 135 images and visuals ‣ 278 spoken sound files ‣ iTooch TOEFL™ Prep is by far the most comprehensive educative tool on the Google Play Store for students preparing TOEFL™. Discover our other iTooch apps on the Google Play Store, available for 1st Grade, 2nd Grade, 3rd Grade, 4th Grade, 5th Grade, 6th Grade, 7th Grade and 8th Grade in Language Arts, Math and Science. iTooch apps comply with the US National Common Core standards for K1, K2, K3, K4, K5, K6, K7 and K8. == CONTACT == ‣ Facebook: http://facebook.com/itoochapps ‣ Twitter: @itooch ‣ Website: http://edupad.com
release_text: - The app and all its educational content become 100% FREE, enjoy! - Introduction of Pop quizzes. Your reviews help us to make our apps even better! Wanna say “Hi”? Send us an email at feedback@edupad.com

description: A simple set of emissivity tables for anyone performing infra-red temperature measurements or Infrared Thermography. A very handy tool for anyone with a FLIR, Fluke or other infrared camera/thermometer. When you need to adjust with an emissivity value- simply open the quick launch app and look up the value. No internet connection is required. You can also search for a material by typing in the first letters of the material type- the app will begin filtering results immediately. Your reports will be more accurate than ever when adjusted with the correct value. Home, business, equipment, roof, mould and other inspections all need adjustment, but not all imagers have the correct value pre-installed. Virtually all infrared camera (and some infrared thermometers) allow for manual emissivity adjustment; simply input the number and continue with your inspection. Take your inspections to a more professional level by compensating each and every one of your images. Your customers will thank you.
release_text: This application has undergone a complete re-design in version 3.0. You can now search for generic values or very specific values. Specific values are separated in two groups- Metals vs Non-Metals. All materials can be filtered by typing the name of the substance you seek- results will filter automatically. Users/comments: Thanks for the feedback Yann, Nancy, Senkusha. Thanks to you the entire application was rebuilt. The tables were completely abandoned in favor of the new interface.

description: A new take on weather apps! Simple, minimalistic weather app that shows you what you need to know and nothing else! EasyWeather™ cuts through the clutter and tells you the temperature and what's falling from the sky. That's it. EasyWeather™ personalizes your forecast to your exact location by using advanced algorithms that aggregate radar data and multiple weather services. Know what's happening directly above your head! Weather data provided by forecast.io Learn how to develop this app and more at deltaprogram.us

Topographic maps 1:50.000 for Dominican Republic and Haiti Easy to use outdoor and offline navigation app with 1:50.000 seamless topographic maps of Hispaniola island. Use this navigation app for outdoor activities like hiking, biking, camping, climbing, riding, canoeing or offroad 4WD tours. This app gives you similar mapping options as you might know from Garmin or Magellan GPS handhelds. Main features for outdoor-navigation: • Free bulk-download of map tiles for OFFLINE USAGE (not for Google and Bing maps) • Create and edit Waypoints • GoTo-Waypoint-Navigation • Create and edit Routes • Route-Navigation (Point-to-Point Navigation) • Track Recording (with speed, elevation and accuracy profile) • Tripmaster with fields for odometer, average speed, bearing, elevation, etc. • GPX/KML/KMZ - Import/Export • Search (placenames, POIs, streets) • Customizable datafields in Map View and Tripmaster (e.g. Speed, Distance, Compass, ...) • Share Waypoints, Tracks or Routes (via eMail, Facebook, ..) • See your location with UTM coordinates • Tablet optimized layouts • and many more ... Available map layers: • Topographic maps 1:50.000 and 1:250.000 with seamless coverage for complete Hispaniola Island (Dominican Republic and Haiti). • Google Maps (Satellite images, Road- and Terrain-Map) • Bing Maps (Satellite images, Road-Map) • Open Street Maps (OSM Mapnik and Cloudemade Cyclemap) • Hillshading overlay layer for OSM, Google or Bing maps On the 1:50.000 maps you'll find many small roads, pathes and 4WD tracks that are not included in Google, Bing or OpenStreetMaps. The topo maps have a very detailed topography with contour lines. There is no other online mapping service/app available that gives you more detailed geographic features like rivers, lakes, hills, vegetation, villages, etc. for this region. The topo maps layer is a seamless mosaic of more than 200 georeferenced maps. Although some of the maps are quite old (production range of the maps is 1966 - 2002) they are still very good for outdoor trips, especially if you are looking adventurous routes or abandoned places. Most maps of the Dominican Republic were created in the late 80ies. Within the app you can open an overview map with the publishing dates of the maps. In larger cities you'll find it more usefull to switch to Google or OSM maps but in the backcountry you will recognize the relevance of large scale topographic maps. The 1:250.000 maps are JOGs (Joint Operations Graphic) which represent a medium scale map intended as both a topographic and an aeronautical chart. Preload FREE map data for areas without cell service. The topographic maps are enhanced with Atlogis® hillshading and placenames. Original publisher of the 1:50.000 topo maps : United States NGA (National Geospatial-Intelligence), NIMA (National Imagery and Mapping Agency), DMA (Defense Mapping Agency) Original publisher of the 1:250.000 topo maps: US NGA/NIMA JOG (Joint Operations Graphics) Please send comments and feature requests to hispaniolamaps@atlogis.com

MUGL - Multi-Up Grocery List A work in progress! MUGL will eventually implement a very useful spin on grocery shopping and general list making. It is currently targeting Android 4.0 with limited support for previous Android OS versions. The MUGL project is 100% free/libre open source and its development is funded by user donations. The source code is available on github (see link below) to encourage amateur Android programmers to fork their own version of the app and potentially contribute to the main branch. The entire project is developed in Android Studio 0.3.0+. This application should be considered UNSTABLE until further notice. CURRENTLY FEATURES: + Batch Item Adding - Hit "Enter" after each item in dialog then input next item (newline separated). + Color Picker - Use color pickers to choose item text checked/unchecked colors. Visit: https://github.com/jlprince21/MUGL ...for project source! Learn, and help me learn Android programming. http://www.onebillionsaved.com/ ...for my personal website! keywords: grocery list, list making, productivity, free libre open source software
release_text: v0.15 14-05-10: Many code improvements and enhancements, most not visible to user. v0.14 14-05-09: Improved color picker. v0.13 13-10-21: Added ability to add multiple items from insert new item dialog. Just hit "enter" after each item and hit "OK" when finished. Added color pickers via Ambilwarna project library. Converted project to Android Studio... no more Eclipse for project development! Full changelist: https://github.com/jlprince21/MUGL/blob/master/MUGL_change_log.txt

description: Cook a variety of dishes from all parts of the world and become an expert chef in this Time Management game. You start from the humble beginnings in an authentic pizza and pasta place in Italy, and as you become a more advanced cook, you go to Hawaii, America, China and France, and become a world famous star chef. Cook pizzas and pastas, ice creams and brownies, pancakes and potato chips, oriental dishes, exquisite French plates and many more. Upgrade your kitchen with fantastic new equipment that you’ve always dreamed of, decorate your restaurant and serve a huge variety of customers with unique tastes and preferences. And have a lot of fun, while doing it, be a Happy Chef! * More than a 100 dishes to cook from all over the globe – from pizzas and pastas to sophisticated oriental plates and French exquisite dishes * 5 locations to master in different parts of the world * More than 70 levels to complete * 5 mini-games with unique visuals * Hundreds of upgrades to decorate and improve your restaurants * 25+ hours to complete the game

Race, stunt and fight your way across America on your motorcycle. Play as one of the Adrenaline Crew, sport bike, cop or chopper rider as you gain points completing stunts and finishing first! +++ONLY PEOPLE RATING THIS 1 STAR ARE USING OLD VERSIONS, UPGRADE YOUR VERSION+++ "One of the best games for 2012" The Washington Post "Road Rash on Steroids" Gamer Online Magazine "If it wasn't for this game I would probably get a lot of work done!" Kenny Kelley From the #1 selling 'Adrenaline Crew' platinum motorcycle mayhem DVD series we come to you now as digital anarchy... HOW TO PLAY - Tilt your phone/tablet to steer left and right - Stay away from cars, curbs, and cops -Tap ATTACK to punch and kick other players off their bikes and get Stunt Bonuses - Tap the Stunt button to wheelie and perform other special stunts - Pick up Nitro's to earn an extra boost. - Tap break to avoid wrecks and sticky situations, bike will automatically do an endo! FEATURES * Adrenaline filled addictive gameplay with ultra smooth tilt controls * Over 10 different characters to unlock and play, each with their own unique abilities, speed and gameplay! * Real stunts the Adrenaline Crew performs on the streets across America * Gain points by holding stunts while being attacked by other riders. * Lifelike character animations and physics * Play with Game Center and add your score to the Leader Boards and unlock achievements! * Facebook integration: compete with your friends for top score and post brags to your wall * Awesome realistic sound effects recorded from real motorcycles, including a sport bike, chopper, dirt bike, and a cafe racer! BONUS TIPS - Save up your Nitro to use in sticky situations like running away from other bikers attacking you - Concentrate on coming in first and just fending off those who attack you - Hit Nitro then Stunt button so you can get extra speed while doing a stunt - If being attacked on the side that a cop is shooting radar don't hit the rider off till you pass the cop, he will go after the other guy instead!
release_text: Updated for all new phones! Read changes below. Changes: *NO ADS * Updated for graphics cards on new phones. * New control system. * All characters of Adrenaline Crew to choose from! * Unlock all bikes or levels with one click! * New Menu buttons and layout for all phones * Added Traffic for higher levels of difficulty. * Added Adrenaline Crew's DVD Trailers * New Sound effects for better game play * Faster speeds for all riders
