Play and race with a fun toy Fire Truck! I loved playing with a toy fire truck as a small child, so I worked with my children to make a simple, easy to play with toy fire truck app. It has light up flashers, sirens, headlights, and a honking horn, plus a race and rescue mode to rush to the fire. Then use taps to fight the fire and save the buildings! Select you favorite fire truck from several skins and race through city, desert, snow, and even night time! Plus we added safety tips after each level for your kids to learn as they play. My three year-old loves it, and we hope your little kids love it, too! • High resolution, interactive, 3D fire truck with sirens and lights • Easy, clear button controls for little fingers • Safety tips to help kids learn • Lots of fun levels and different fire truck skins!

You are in the supermarket and you don't remember what you wanted to buy? Or you were already shopping and at home you realize that you've forgotten some products? Then this app is just right for you. With "Quick Shopping List" shopping is now a breeze. Because your shopping list is always with you, you can enter products immediately if you notice that they are missing at home. From now on you'll never forget anything while shopping. You can mark products as favorites. These favorites can be added quickly to your shopping lists. During the initial app start you can decide to load sample product suggestions. You can create as many shopping lists as you want and add products. Frequently used items will be proposed automatically. In addition, shopping lists can be shared with others via e-mail, SMS, WhatsApp, Twitter, Facebook, Google+ and many other services. So you can easily send a shopping list, for example, to your partner. What makes this app different from other shopping list apps? We have placed the focus in a simple and fast usability. Therefore, this app is not overloaded with unnecessary features and instead focusing on the essentials. If you still miss features, do not hesitate to contact us. We always have an open ear for the needs of our users! We therefore verify whether your requirements are feasible, without considering the overall usability. Download "Quick Shopping List" now and see for yourself how easy this app is to use. Of course for free! Keywords: shopping list, shopping, shop, list, quick, quick shopping list, simple, easy, fast, products, list of products, product suggestions, e-mail, email, sms, whatsapp, whats app, twitter, face, facebook, google+

The CanonLenses app is a guide to Canon's current lineup of EF and EF-S Mount lenses used by both Canon's digital and film SLR cameras. You can view all the lenses at once or you can view lenses in a selected category. You have the ability to sort by aperture, minimum focal length and ESP (Estimated Retail Price). Each lens has a detail page which provides links to the Canon web page detailing the lens, reviews of the lens from third parties (if available - brand new lenses might not have reviews yet) and information on where to rent the lens in the US (if available).

Now with the option to select christmas tree (snow covered Norwegian spruce) from the settings! Realistic winter scene with snowfall over the twin trees (or different pine trees) out on a winter field. Snow falls in different directions and depths giving a nice 3d feel. Clouds move over the sky in different planes. Watch the sky and clouds shift color as the time goes by, or select your favorite time. Change speed of the clouds to rush in a cinematic time-lapse style, or just let them slowly move over the sky as the snowflakes dance in the air. The free version is fully functional and ad-free. But most settings are locked. The full version has a dynamic sky & light color system with seamless transformations that makes every second of the day cycle unique. It is fully customizable: - select tree, choose between different trees: - twin trees - 2 different christmas trees with lights - three different pine trees - select any time of day - or set real time to enable continuous, super smooth color shifts during day and night - show / hide background - select different backgrounds - show / hide moon - move and change size of moon - hide or show low clouds - select different clouds - hide or show high clouds - set snowflake count from 0-2000 - select cloud speed from super fast to very slow The wallpaper is OpenGL based and will make use of your devices GPU, instead of the CPU, which gives it a very smooth experience, and does not interfere with other system tasks. The live wallpaper is only active when your home screen is visible making battery impact minimal. It has tablet support with android 3.x honeycomb landscape mode of wallpapers. Also check the later wallpapers in the tree series: Spring Trees Summer Trees Autumn Trees Binary Tree If you like winter trees, you will just love "Winter Wonderland LWP", also from Adermark Media.

description: IpSmartAltimeter is SmartWatch extension to display pressure sensor based altitude on your SmartWatch. To be able to use IpSmartAltimeter you need to have a phone with a pressure sensor. Phones with pressure sensors include Sony Active, Sony GO, Galaxy Nexus, Galaxy Note or Galaxy S III. You also clearly need a SmartWatch. There are options to lock the display bright or dim or leave it in automatic mode. If you lock it your battery will drain fairly quickly. Just touch the icons. Swipe up or down to switch from the altimeter screen to a time screen. On start-up if the pressure has not been calibrated within 2 hours then GSP based calibration is attempted. The GPS is started, if a good location if obtained within 2 minutes this location is used to check the altitude cache. If there is an entry in the altitude cache it is used to calibrate the altimeter. If no cached entry is used then an online lookup is attempted for the location. The resulting altitude and location are added to the cache and used to calibrate the altitude. You can swipe left and right for the manual calibration screen and the settings screen. Press to toggle filtering on and off and units from as meters or feet in the settings screen. In the manual calibration screen swipe up to delete the last digit, swipe down for zero. If the value is red then there is not currently a good location and the calibration will not be added to the cache. If the value is green the location and manual altitude will be added to the cache. Swipe right or left to set the altitude and exit the calibration screen. I currently consider this to be beta. Any problems please feel free to email support@iforpowell.com I request the Internet permission for the crash reporting system I use and the analytics system as well as for doing the online altitude lookup. The analytics uses Flurry and is anonymous, I am just interested in how the app is being used in order to make improvements. There are options in the settings screen to switch off the crash reporting and the analytics if you want to. I request the gps permission to look up the location in order to do automatic calibration. I stop looking up after two minutes if a good fix is not obtained. I request access to external storage to save the calibration cache data. I request the network state to help deciding if an online altitude lookup is possible. LiveWare™ extension for SmartWatch
release_text: 0.5.0 fix altitude initalisation issue. fix some problems from crash reports. 0.4.0 modify pressure sensor code to cope better with slow sampleing rate of Galaxy Note. Some crash report fixes. 0.3.0 Added simple time screen. Tweaked analitics to get more information on how the sensor is working on different phones. Some algorithm tweaks are likely once I have more data. I consider this to be a beta. Please feel free to email me about any issues. support@iforpowell.com

description: Adds a 'Media Keys' shortcut creator. ( A shortcut creator does not necessarily open like other apps... instead, install, and then go to your shortcut supporting app, like your 'home' app, and long press to add a shortcut. 'Media Keys' will show up in the list of shortcut creators. ) Creates FF,REW,Play/Pause,Stop,Next,Previous shortcuts. (None of the music apps support Bluetooth FF & REW yet, and most don't support STOP, but PLAY/PAUSE and NEXT are commonly supported) Support for a music player solely depends on the player author supporting Bluetooth media controls, such as those on many A2DP headphones. It has been known to work with the following: * built-in 'Music' * Pandora * Google Listen * Rhapsody * AudioGalaxy May be useful with BlueDock as a connect or disconnect activity. Or Car Dock for Big Play button, or whatever you like.

Summary of Features: 1. Analysis of Variance (ANOVA) 2. Beta Function 3. Scientific Calculator (infix) 4. Covariance & Correlation 5. Effective Size 6. Error Function 7. Gamma Function 8. Probability a. CDF & PDF b. p-value and Inverse p-value 9. Simple and Multiple Regression 10. Solver (with reverse Polish post-fix calculator) 11. Summary Statistics 12. Context Sensitive Help videos 13. Call support 14. E-Mail support 15. Accepts data files to process 16. Draws graphs & charts Detail: ANOVA - Analysis of Variance - Features: Intra-class Correlation Calculator for ANOVA One-Way ANOVA Calculator From Summary Data - supply number of subjects, mean and standard deviation From Detail Data - supply data within a group and keep adding groups From Data File - supply tab delimited file. Beta Function: Beta Function Calculator Incomplete Beta Function Calculator Regularized Incomplete Beta Function Calculator Scientific Calculator (Infix notation): 18 Basic Arithmetic Operations Ability to specify and perform fractions 5 Probability Operations 4 Memory Operations 13 Trigonometry operations 5 Statistics functions + data repeat Specify significance and precision Autometic precedence and ability parenthesis Covariance & Correlation: Covariance and Correlation by entering data. Data sets need to appear column wise. When a row is added, the data points for all the groups in the same position are added. Covariance and Correlation from file Covariance from correlation Correlation from covariance Significance of correlation Effect Size: Effect Size - Hierarchical Multiple Regression Effect Size - Multiple Regression Effect size Student's t-Test: Calculates the (two-tailed) effect size for Student's t-test (Cohen's d), given the mean and standard deviation for two independent samples of equal size. Error Function: Computes the value of the error function (a.k.a the Gauss error function) evaluated at a value of x. The value returned will be the error function evaluated along the integral from zero to x. Computes value of the complementary error function. Error function evaluated along the integral from x to positive infinity. Gamma Function: Gamma Function Incomplete Gamma Function Regularized Incomplete Gamma Function Probability: 5 Probability Density Function (PDF) functions 3 Cumulative Density Function (CDF) functions a. Fisher F-Distribution b. Normal distribution c. Standard Normal Distribution 9 p-Values + 5 inverse a. Chi-Square test b. Correlation Coefficient c. Fisher F-test & inverse d. Fisher' Exact Test e. Normal - cumulative, 1 & 2-Tailed & inverse f. Student T-Test & inverse Simple and Multiple Regression: Calculates simple and multiple regression Accepts input from data file Allows entry of input data from key board 4. Draws graphs for simple regression Solver (with reverse Polish post-fix notation calculator): Solves f(x) Value of f(x) at c fc clears fx Cij supplies coefficient 20 Basic Arithmetic functions Fraction functions 5 Probability Operations 4 Memory Operations 13 Trigonometry operations 5 Statistics functions + data repeat Specify significance and precision Simplify fractions Summary Statistics: Calculates the following 10 summary statistics. min max mean n sum sum of squares standard deviation variance 95th percentile skewness From entering data points or picking up data in a file where each line contains a data point.

The most popular classic puzzle game available here! AE Sudoku! ** Features ** - Unique Solution - Memo Mode - Hints - Four Difficulty Levels Sudoku has never been this addictive and easy to use before! Any feedbacks please email us. Thanks very much for all your support in our games! AE Sudoku is a logic-based combinatorial number-placement puzzle game. The main purpose of this game is to fill a 9x9 grid with the numbers 1 through 9, such that each number appears exactly once in each row, column, and region (3x3 sub-grid). This AE Sudoku game offers four difficulty levels, from easy to expert, ensures that you will be able to find a puzzle that matches your skill levels. It becomes increasingly challenging and addictive as you play at high levels. You will be amazed that AE Sudoku can be this fantastic! It offers Hints when you are stuck and Mistake alert when you place wrong numbers to help with your puzzle. It also comes with awesome features to help anyone easily complete a puzzle from the novice to the expert without any frustration. Besides, you can switch it to memo mode to help you write notes. Beautiful graphics, amazing animations, addictive and smooth gameplay as well as killer features, which will give you a lot of fun! You will never want to put it down! If you enjoy thinking, and prefer puzzle games, you should not miss this game! Challenge your interest by using your wits and skill to master AE Sudoku. Get AE Sudoku today and join fun!

description: How many usernames, passwords and pin codes do you have to remember? With the Friendly Password Safe you can easily organize all your usernames, passwords and secret notes in one place. And, unlike most password managers that require internet, sdcard or cloud permissions, this one does NOT REQUIRE ANY PERMISSIONS AT ALL. It is now known that intelligence agencies steal our personal keys stored or transmitted through the internet, so strong LOCAL encryption is of paramount importance. The Friendly password safe: - Does NOT show advertisements - Does NOT require internet access or cloud support - Keeps data locally (can't even access you SD card) - Is simple to use, does not try to pose as an "organizer" - Utilizes the latest in strong encryption and in multiple layers - Requires no android application permissions at all! - Supports white/black and newer holo themes - Works on a wide range of android devices (from android 2.1 phones to newer tablets) Important Tips: - Tap to edit entries, LONG tap to delete them (confirmation will be shown) - Categories and their icons are editable. Define your personal categories early, so you can organize your entries - Password changes are recorded (password history is maintained) - By pressing the [FILTER] button, you can easily find the entry you are looking for, based on its category. - Since the app does not use ANY android permission at all, it CANNOT save/sync your data to the internet. This is a security choice... not a flaw... unless you trust remote servers keeping your data ! - Users with rooted phones are prone to attacks (on all applications, not just this one). Rooting your phone without extensive linux knowledge compromises security.
release_text: Version 1.04 updated for latest android 6.0 model, removed app from recent app list, tons of improvements. Smaller APK file size. Version 1.03 adds support for Android 4.4 kit-kat and a new color theme (Volcanic) Version 1.02 adds support for Android 4.3

description: Gobliiins Trilogy is a compilation of three games including Gobliiins, Gobliins 2 and Goblins 3. Released successively one after the other from 1991 to 1993 on PC, thoses point’n’click classics are now available on Android in a new version specifically enhanced for mobiles & tablets. In the first game, play the adventures of Oops, Asgard and Ignatius (also known as Dwayne, Hooter and BoBo in US) who are looking for a remedy to cure the king Angoulafre. Each character has specific abilities so you will need to play with them alternatively to succeed all the different levels. In the second one, two goblins have to find and free the Prince. You will alternate between two diametrically opposed characters once again to reach your goals! Finally, in the last game and certainly the funniest, you play as a journalist goblin in charge of a report about the conflict between the queen and the king. However, a forced landing will upset his life: he fall in love with the Princess Winona and find himself in conflict, and then was bitten by a werewolf... Features: • New interface specially redesigned for mobile & tablet • Two control modes: «Touch » and «classique » • New gameplay adapted to the touch • Choose between original graphics or video filtering (for rich, smooth graphics) • « Hotspot »system : highlight interaction areas if necessary • « Hint » system : progressive hints on player’s request • Original soundtrack Funny and mysterious adventures, original puzzles, colorful game with cartoon graphics, Gobliiins Trilogy offers you hours of fun at your fingertips! This product uses ScummVM distributed under GPLv2 license. More information at http://scummvm.org/ & http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html . Source code available at http://www.dotemu.com/gpl

description: FingerPen 500+ coloring book 🎨 is an exciting, educational application for kids. Ads free What our users say about the app "Finally a proper colouring book. I have been looking all over the app store for a colouring book that wasn't just a point and click. This app when used with the stylus of my note 2 is as good as normal colouring book and pencil as it encourages kids to draw between the lines. The fact that it is portable to take on planes etc makes this app the only colouring app I will be keeping on this phone." Simple to use, My 4 almost 5 yr old loves this app especially since she can save her drawings and share them. It is very easy to use. She just loves it. It's simple & funny for my 2-years old daughter. Just great! Best coloring book I've seen so far. Simple and it's a real coloring book not "a fill color" app. FEATURES: • Realistic finger painting that requires precision and practice. • Develops fine motor skills and creativity. • 8 drawing categories: for boys, for girls, for kids. animals, number & letters, shapes, halloween and pot luck. • Over 500 unique illustrations prepared especially for kids • Engaging, age-appropriate and skill-appropriate topics. • Store completed drawings in the app gallery or share them via email and facebook. • HD device friendly - the app adjusts to screen sizes of all cellphones and tablet devices. • Ads free. • Free updates. Full description It invites children to draw & color a wide variety of animals, landscapes, digits, numbers and much more. Your child has the possibility to express themselves creatively and become familiar with a full palet of colors. This application is visually arresting and intuitive which creates the perfect educational platform for kids. The application is divided into several coloring-in categories and progressive levels of difficulty. Children and/or parents can share their personalized paintings via email and facebook or simply store them in their own gallery. An app can be used at the playschool, preschool, for fun as an educational game. Every little girl loves coloring little hearts, dresses and flowers we prepared. Pictures for boys are diggers, excavators, cars, automobiles . The biggest attraction though is coloring animals, that make real sounds!!! Real animal sounds are of course not the only thing your child will learn. FingerPen is also about coloring other objects, like cars, rockets, trucks, ducks, apples, butterflies, dresses, handbags and much, much more. We have over 500 coloring pages for your child and we’re still working on enlarging that number! Learning through play - this is it! Painting is an art, which contribute to the proper development of your child. Check out our unlimited free coloring, painting and drawing pictures like: pony, butterfly, doll, cat, fish, lion, dinosaur, boat and a lot more. Our educational games guarantee great fun that you can share Become a fan of ITSS Games on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ITSSGames Follow us on Google Plus: http://bit.ly/ITSSGames Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ITSSGames This small application requires internet connectivity and subsequent small data transfer charges apply.

Earthquake Finder provides a visual display of recent earthquake activity on a 3D globe or 2D flat map of the world. Simple, easy to use interface shows the most recent day's quakes upon start. Take more control with pop-up windows to see the previous week's data plus recent volcanic activity. Tap an earthquake to see a list of all nearby quakes. For each earthquake in the list the latitude, longitude, magnitude, and depth are displayed. Tap the latitude/longitude to view its location in your browser. Tap a volcano to see a list of all nearby volcanoes. Recent earthquake data is obtained from a USGS data feed and is updated every 5 minutes (requires an internet connection). Data controls allow the user to select a combination of earthquake magnitudes, focus depths and times (one day to one week). Recent volcanic activity or historical earthquake data may also be displayed. Map controls allow you to select which type of plate boundaries are displayed as well as different maps that show physiographic features, continents, or countries. Explore the relationship between earthquakes, volcanoes and tectonic plate boundaries by dynamically selecting these features.
release_text: Earthquake info pop-up now shows a list of all quakes at the touched location! Tap location coordinates in the info list to view that location on a map in your browser. Better layout for smaller devices. Bigger dots on smaller devices. Allow larger zoom factors on small devices. Added Help screen.

My Credit Cards automatically manages all your credit cards in one place! My Credit Cards will store all information related to your credit card on your android phone by automatically understanding the messages that the banks send to you without fail! Everytime you carry out a transaction or make a payment or a bill is generated for your credit card, your bank sends you a SMS informing you of that. Now, ourselves, with all thats going on in our lives and so many cards that we own anyway, it's next to impossible to keep a track of all this. They serve as good updates, but the only way for us to find out what our current unbilled is or how much payment needs to be made this month or anything else, the only way to do it maintain a ledger somewhere. My Credit Cards simplifies all this. My Credit Cards reads these SMS, understands them and collates them in one place - on your android phone. How does this work? By itself! :) On a more serious note, here's a description of how it works: - It reads incoming SMS (on installation / update, it will read SMSs in your inbox) - It sends the SMS to our server (This is a point of contention, we understand, hence, we've given our thought process below) - The server understands the SMS and reverts with the key information from it - The mobile application receives this information, performs the relevant tasks and stores the information on a local database Thats it! Whenever you open the app, all information about your credit card is organized and waiting for you... Which Credit Cards work with this app? Currently, we support the following banks: - HDFC Bank - Citibank - ICICI Bank - IndusInd Bank - American Express - Standard Chartered (Regular / Manhattan) - American Express - HSBC - SBI - Axis Bank We'll keep expanding this portfolio of supported cards - thanks to our policy of processing the SMS online on our server. Why do we send your SMSs to our server? First off, we never store / read any of your personal SMS. Our objective : To provide a consistent and un-broken experience for our customers. The problems : 1. Banks keep changing their SMS formats 2. Every bank sends 4-5 different kinds of SMSs - for transactions, for payments, for bill generation and then there are variations amongst these. Multiply that with the number of banks and we have a huge no of possibilities. Also, these are ever-changing possibiliities. Our solution : We maintain the various "parsers" (a SMS format) on our server so that we can keep them updated. In which case, all the app needs to do is, send the SMS to the server and it will always know what to do with it. Do we store any personal information about you? No. At no point in time can we identify you with any personal information like your name, mobile no, your complete credit card no or your email address. The application generates a unique identifier on your phone the first time you run it and that is the only identification token that we have.
release_text: Version 1.2 - SMS prioritization - should work now on devices where SMSs were not being read by the app properly - Bug fixes - add EMIs easily now

description: ★★★★★ New York Subway Map available for free download (internet connection required). This app makes it easy to view large transport maps on your Android device. When you first launch the app, it downloads the latest version of the map from the web and process it into image tiles, this might take a few minutes. Once that is done, the future loading time will be very fast. Most PDF software on Android cannot handle large files well, they are slow in loading the files and zooming in. Our app is designed to be a fast reader for large image PDFs. ★★★★★ Over 3 million mobile users are already using our Free Tranport Maps, covering over 30 major cities around the world. This is our first pilot release on Android. Please feedback on any bugs or suggestions to us and we will improve our app for you. We have also lowered the introduction price of our map packs to just 99 cents during this testing phase, buy now to enjoy the low price before it goes back up to $2.99 and $9.99. You can also purchase our map packs (internet connection required) to download other publicly available PDF maps and store them on your Android device. You can download the maps when you have fast wifi connection - and then use any time in the future without delay. Please note that we do not provide any of the maps and by clicking on any of the links, you are downloading directly from the web and agreeing to the respective sites license agreement. The software helps you to store and load the downloaded copy to save repeated download time and costs. We believe that anyone with a smartphone should be able to have PDF travel maps on their device and we are working hard to help eliminating the use of paper for travel maps. We are glad to have saved 3 million sheets of paper so far. :) ✔ Download (internet connection required) and store maps and guides for offline use - no more time-consuming searches! ✔ Works with most Android devices including tablet support. ✔ Supports the pinch-to-zoom feature! ✔ Tap on the map for full screen view to hide the toolbars. ✔ Simple user interface and intuitive user experience. ✔ Add Map Packs with in-app purchase. COMING SOON: Our team is already working on the next version which is even faster, other new features including customizable list for adding and sorting your own list of maps and guides, favorites lists, integration with web community, user-ratings and translation into many languages. Stay tuned for the free update. We have transport map for the following cities: London, New York, Tokyo, Bangkok, Singapore, Paris, Beijing, San Francisco, Chicago, Madrid, Hong Kong, Brussels, Los Angeles, Geneva, Miami, Amsterdam, Vienna, Philadelphia, Atlanta, Dallas, Buenos Aires, Sao Paulo, Toronto, Shanghai, Prague, Lyon, Rennes, Berlin, Hamburg, Munich, Athens, Delhi, Milan, Naples, Turin, Fukuoka, Kyoto, Nagoya, Osaka, Sapporo, Kuala Lumpur, Mexico City, Rotterdam, Oslo, Moscow, Seoul, Barcelona, Stockholm, Lausanne, Glasgow, Newcastle / Sunderland, Baltimore, Cleveland, Valencia, Porto and Rio de Janeiro. ★★★★★ Our Production Team iOS Development: Myles Harding, Jin Khera Graphic Design: Nancy Wu, Bella Xue, Amy Xu Administrative Support: Sai Wu Producer: Edward Tsang ★★★★★ Please understand that this is an ongoing development. If you have found any issues or bugs, please let us know by email, support@ondemandworld.com . We will solve them with free updates. Check out http://www.ondemandworld.com/wheretoeat/ for more info. ➔ Follow us on Twitter. http://twitter.com/ondemandworld ‼ Like us on Facebook. http://facebook.com/ondemandworld

Please rate and leave a comment =3 This wallpaper doesnt support tablets for the moment For any live wallpaper requests send an email to simplelwpcreationsdesign@gmail.com How to install your LWP 1.Go to settings 2.Select display 3.Select wallpaper 4.Select home screen or both 5.Select live wallpaper 6.Select LoL The Nine Tails LWP 7.Select settings 8.Put No Scroll Mode and put the desire settings Suggested settings: Number of items :150% Speed:Medium Frame rate:100 Direction:Diagonal Right

Puzzle Trains is an original colorful jigsaw application designed not only for kids. Your task is to assemble all parts of a train. To set each wagon together, you have to find the correct positions for all four parts. Consequently, the most challenging is to place its wheels. But if you are correct the train starts moving and smoking:-) Two trains (summer and winter variants) are provided for free without any limitation. If you like the game, you can then buy another trains in different visual styles - circus, desert, night, ocean, space and dino variants. Check our website for further details. We appreciate any feedback. Thank you!

Are you in your right weight? Check it easily with this app. It will calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) and will let you know if you are underweight, in good weight or overweight. Just swipe your finger over the measure tapes to enter your weight and height and get the BMI value and also your ideal weight range. This BMI calculator supports imperial and metric units,and you can alternate in just one click between kg or lbs and feet/inches or meters. Very usable BMI calculator and the only one in the market that doesn't require you to press the the button every time you want to calculate a new value. Key features of this app: - Very user friendly UI. - Imperial and metrics units. - Easy way to input height and weight values. - Real time BMI value. - Graphic coloured results. - Ideal weight estimation. - Exact calculation also with people under 19 years old. NOTE: Body Mass Index (BMI) is a simple index of weight-for-height that is commonly used to classify underweight, overweight and obesity. If you want more information regarding BMI you can check wikipedia page in this link: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Body_mass_index
release_text: BMI values over 40 are now shown

description: Description Immerse yourself in an epic war for survival, encounter tiny, yet deadly enemies, guide the smallest of beings to greatest victories, evolve and become the dominant species. Core: Your mission is to ensure the survival of your species. Use genetic engineering to make your life form stronger, gain new abilities, help it replicate and conquer new hosts. Discover a new world under the microscope. Prove your skills in deadly viral fight with other microbiological organisms. Features: - Universal App - Distinct phone and tablet levels. - Endless replay value: play with randomized enemies, collect rewards for each replay. - 5 Upgradable stats, 10 Upgrade levels, 100.000 upgrade combinations. - Unlock 30 challenging levels - Interact with four host cell types: Normal, Regeneration, Defense, Speed - Multi Touch - Intuitive Controls
release_text: 2.2 Minor Improvements 2.1 Anti-Cheating System. Minor Improvements. Bug-fixing. 2.0 New Levels. New Upgrade Tree. Russian, French, Romanian localisation. Performance improvements.

description: The Jewish Chronicle, the world’s oldest and most trusted independent Jewish newspaper, is now available as you’ve never seen it before. You can read it cover-to-cover in an attractive, easy-to-use format that includes all the news, features, comment and cutting-edge analysis for which it is renowned. Download the app and take advantage of 30 days FREE access. After that, you can opt to take out a subscription for one, three or 12 months using the Google Play in-App purchase method. FREE 30-day access to The Jewish Chronicle. WHY IT’S WORTH IT - Read the JC on the move - wherever you are in the world. - Store, access and search back issues. - Download it to read offline (entire issues or individual pages). - Use the zoom tool for clearer reading of selected articles. - Flip your device and read the newspaper as a double-page spread or full-screen single page. - Tap the page selector to choose a specific page for fast navigation. - Search by keywords to find recent content. - Share articles via e-mail, Twitter and Facebook. And remember, the newspaper in its entirety is updated every Thursday. SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS - £4.99 per month. - £12.99 quarterly - £44.99 12 months - Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. - No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. - The Jewish Chronicle reserves the right to alter the pricing at any point.
release_text: - Several updates and performance improvements - Option to subscribe to an auto renewing subscription through the app

description: Live wallpaper of magical floating islands in the sky. Ever dream of going into a fantasy sci-fi environment just like Avatar? Now is your chance to experience a painted stylized version right on your home screen. Watch as the mystical islands float up and down; the clouds move in different speeds as the screen moves back and forth to display the whole relaxing setting. All textures and design were done from scratch. You can change the colour theme to an orange dawn/sunset setting. If there's any problems, please email me with your phone model and android version. If it works, please rate/review it.

description: Time to heat up that engine: welcome to the roaring world of Hot Rod Racers! Challenge fierce street racers in exciting drag racing events! No kidding around - you’ll have to bring your A-game. Use any means necessary to win: crash into your opponent’s car and show how badly you want to win! Experience different gameplay modes, including dodging traffic cones, jumping off ramps, racing against the clock and more. Earn tons of coins and upgrade your cars to build the best racing machine possible. Got an engine upgrade? Show it off and enjoy your car’s improved performance. There are also a variety of paint jobs and decals, to show off your hot rod at its hottest! Are you ready to become King of the road? KEY FEATURES: • A detailed hot rod world set in a 3D urban landscape • 13 different episodes to complete • Lots of crazy characters to encounter • Ground-breaking physics: crash into your opponent’s car to slow him down • Different gameplay modes: dodge traffic cones, jump off ramps, avoid walls and more… • Upgrade your vehicle’s components and aesthetics to make it look even cooler **************************************** Find out more about Miniclip: http://www.miniclip.com "Like" Miniclip on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/miniclip “Like” Hot Rod Racers on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/hotrodracers Follow Hot Rod Racers on Twitter: http://twitter.com/hotrodgame Follow Miniclip on Twitter: http://twitter.com/miniclip

description: Are you underweight, of normal weight, overweight, obese or grossly obese? What should your daily Calorie (food) requirement be? What should your daily Calorie intake be if you want to loss or gain weight? Do you want to monitor your daily Calorie intake, or monitor how much you have lost through exercise? This suite of apps is designed for these purposes. One fundamental aspect of good health is to maintain a normal body weight. Today, lifestyle diseases like diabetes, high blood pressure and heart diseases are the main causes of ill health. An abnormal weight plays a crucial role in these diseases. Further, it also contributes to many other health problems such as irregular periods in women and infertility in both men and women. This app helps you to monitor your weight, your body mass index and know what your requirement is if you want to maintain, lose or gain weight. It also helps you keep track of your daily intake and expenditure (by exercise). Special care is taken to keep it simple. You should only need to spend a few minutes of your time on this app. This app is an essential mobile health app for every adult.

description: This 2048 game is a simple, fun, and addictive number puzzle game. Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! HOW TO PLAY: Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, you wins! Start play this 2048 game, compete with your friends to see who can make the best score. Please give us feedback in comments, we will make it the best 2048 game! Game 2048 is based on http://gabrielecirulli.github.io/2048/ .

This is the best 100 Balls Game ! Test your reflex only with screen tapping. Each ball you get through the cup rewards you with a different amount of points, depending on the color of the cup. The scope is filling the glasses with the colored balls. Only glasses with balls will go back in the big pot, the empty glasses will be destroyed. Colored balls have different scores and bonus. To win the game try to don't loose the balls and fill the glasses to remain in the game, to receive more points and to reach higher scores! This game is very easy and enjoyable to play, with just a single tap! Please feel free to contact us through our contact e-mail and through your reviews, we value your input!

description: Ever seen Countdown? or Letters and Numbers on TV? Now you can play a similar game on your android device! You are presented with 5 numbers and you have to use a selection of then to form the total. You can only use each number once, and not all numbers have to be used. There are three difficulty levels so that you can always have a challenge. This game will stimulate your mind and help keep your brain exercising.

Experience the most comprehensive information ever offered by the largest newsroom in Quebec. Mobile, interactive and intuitive, La Presse + (La Presse Plus) combines the best of print, web and video and let you deepen news fingertips. Easily navigate rich content and expanded at any time and stay up to date with the news thanks to news. Subscribe for free now + La Presse (The Press Plus) and redefine the way to inform you. Features - Friendly and intuitive experience; - Rich and expanded to deepen with videos, photo galleries, interactive images, audio clips, folders tab, scrolling and more screens Content; - Articles, photos, illustrations and videos viewable in full screen mode; - Real-time news; - Automatic download and overnight delivery editions before 5 am 30; - Edition available offline once downloaded; - Share content with various applications such as Facebook and Twitter; - Access to the section break, exclusive to La Presse +; - Access to external links without leaving the app; - Auto Scroll articles and choice of font size; - Dashboard that allows you to view old editions; - New crossword and horoscope every day; - Ability to see La Presse + on a TV using an HDMI cable. Application permissions By downloading La Presse +, you give the following permissions: - Get location data during subscription (precise position thanks to the Wi-Fi network and approximate GPS position), only if the reader allows; - Read the memory of the tablet (USB storage contents) and edit / delete to allow downloading and deleting editions on the shelf; - Look for accounts on the tablet to fetch mail when subscribing only permitted if the player; - View network connections, and get full access to the network and receive data from Internet to allow downloading Editions and receive notifications; - To run at startup to allow reception of today's edition and notifications to the opening of the tablet; - Check the buzzer to signal the receipt of notifications; - Prevent the tablet going into sleep mode when using the Press + to allow reading an article in full screen mode or video. To view the Privacy Policy La Presse + for Android Tablets, please visit the http://plus.lapresse.ca/politiqueandroid site.

Did you ever wanted to become a fantasy hero? Now you have a chance with Task Hammer! Task Hammer is an rpg game and a task list app in one. Task Hammer lets you complete your epic quests or daily routines and even gets you awarded for that. You can be a barbarian, a rouge or a sorceress and level up your character by doing real world stuff. Task Hammer is also really useful todo list: it's simple, it's beautiful and also has alarms, widgets & repeating tasks. We also cruched most bugs before releasing it ;-) In case of any problems please, send us email. We cannot reply to Google Play comments. Notice: Task Hammer is not connected to Epic Win, Task XP nor RLRPG. Keywords: rpg task list, rpg todo list, level up, xp
release_text: Task Hammer is back. Lately I have been quite busy, and did not have time for developing Tash Hammer. However I managed to add few small features: - Mon - Fri repetition type - improved priorities - improved date picker - more bugfixes Thanks for your mails with suggestions.

description: From the creator of SpiritVox, Echovox and Spirit Voice comes a new paranormal investigation tool. SpiriTrap is a sensor based application which uses your devices Magnetometer and Accelerometer sensors available on most devices. If your device does not have the required sensor it will not be available. The idea is simple, use SpiriTrap in a doorway, room or hallway to detect footsteps or EMF fluctuations. It can also be used as an interaction device as the sensors are set to be VERY sensitive and it should be easily triggered by an energy source. 2 Modes, Silent and Alarm. Silent mode is just that, silent, no alarm will sound and it will monitor the area and write changes to a .txt log file with a time/date stamp. This means you can monitor an area for fluctuations for a long period of time unmanned. When set to alarm mode an alarm will sound when the device is triggered. Again, think of all the uses for that. UPON PRESSING "ARM" YOU HAVE 5 SECONDS TO LEAVE THE AREA. This is a simple program for serious investigators. A great way to cover a hall, or use the time stamps to back up other evidence such as MEL spikes, footsteps etc. I am planning adding more sensors such as static, light, and sound monitoring/auto record in version 2 when it's ready. PLEASE NOTE: YOU MUST HAVE AT LEAST 1 OF THE 2 SENSORS MENTIONED ABOVE FOR THIS TO FUNCTION. MOST DEVICES HAVE AT LEAST 1. ALSO: The sensors are VERY sensitive if you run into trouble with alarms tripping to easily please contact me at spiritvox@bigbeardaudio.com This is a new idea and it will be growing as development and user feedback continue. I fully support all my apps and am easy to reach. FOLLOW ME ON TWITTER: www.twitter.com/spiritvoxapp THAT IS THE BEST WAY TO REACH ME FOR SUPPORT. I am a paranormal researcher, this is my life. I build these tools so we can find ANSWERS. See my ghost hunting adventures at www.youtube.com/bigbeardaudio and my blog: spiritvox.bigbeardaudio.com DEMO VIDEO IN PRODUCTION.

Guess the sound! Hear the sound and fill the words. It can be a movie, a band, related to a character, an animal sound or an object! Its simple, fun and addictive! "Meow" ... is it a animal sound? is it cat?! "its a bird... its a plane.." have you heard this sound in you childhood? or in a movie? Yes its Superman! Funny sounds related to movie soundtracks or dialogues! Comic superhero sounds..animal sounds and much much more! nearly 100 levels! much more will be added! Some sounds maybe hard to guess but we provides you with FREE hints ! Just play and WIN! if you cant remember some! Do not worry! The game has hints for you! 1) Bomb Hint: Destroy one guessing Letter! as a letter less is always helpful :) 2) Place it Hint: Place a correct Alphabet in the correct position! a product of Woody Apps!
release_text: - new look and feel! -new UI and new icon - bugs fixed

description: Todo Cloud (formerly Todo Pro) is the KING of Collaborative To-Do App Services—now available for Android. It includes the world's most powerful collaborative service, plus all the features of Todo - the world's first, and one of the most popular, powerful, and award-winning collaborative to-do list and task manager mobile apps ever! Todo is used by millions of individuals, families and teams for GETTING THINGS DONE. "Todo has stood the test of time" -Silicon Slopes. Winner of the “Best Productivity App for iPad” (Best Apps Ever, To-Do Apps) and listed among the “Top Ten Paid Productivity Apps...” "Appigo Todo oozes with awesomeness...” –Macworld, 4.5 stars. Main reasons to consider Todo Cloud: 1. The world's most advanced collaboration service of any to-do app service: -Shared list & projects -Shared Assignments -Comments & notes -Multiple team support and email notifications 2. The Price Performance Leader. Subscribe once--use on ALL platforms for FREE. Unlike other to-do app services that charge extra on every platform, your modest subscription allows you to use Todo Cloud on all platforms (iOS, Mac, Web and Android) for no extra cost. Two subscription options: At $1.99 per month, or $19.99 per year, Todo Cloud is one of the most affordable collaboration services (others cost $10 - $50 more per year with fewer capabilities than Todo Cloud). In addition, you get enhancements to Todo: -Add tasks with email Task Creation (send email to add to your task list). -Advanced Synchronization. Supports synchronization of EVERY Todo feature (tags, assignments, tasks, projects w/checklists, and more) across all of your devices (iOS, Mac, Web and Android). You also get... 3. REAL PRODUCITVITY. Including Projects, Sub-tasks, Start Dates, Due Dates, Recurring Tasks (with detailed recurring options), Multiple Task Alerts, Overdue Tasks, Search, Folders, and much more. 4. PROVEN GTD METHODOLOGY. Todo Cloud uses the popular Getting Things Done approach with Focus To-do Lists, Starred Tasks, Multi-level Priorities, Quick Entry, Context, and Projects with Layered and Prioritized Sub-Tasks-- all recommended GTD approaches. 5. COOLNESS -Geotagging. Reminds you of tasks when close to task location. This way you will remember the milk when you get near a grocery store. -Contacts Integration. Link your task to a contact and call, text, or email "John" with one tap. -Context. Organizes your task by activity or location (i.e. home, work, errands . . .) so you won’t be distracted with your “home” tasks while you are at work. 14 day FREE trial! After you subscribe, your Todo Cloud subscription will be charged to your credit card through your Google Play account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel the subscription renewal at any time, and the subscription you purchased will remain active until the end of the current period. Manage your renewing subscriptions Google Play. EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SUPPORT Please visit us for help at http://help.appigo.com Todo Cloud Privacy Policy: https://www.todopro.com/privacy Todo Cloud Terms of Use: https://www.todopro.com/terms
release_text: We are renaming Todo Pro to be Todo Cloud to better describe the app and Todo Cloud service. - Added the ability to receive in-app shared list notifications and accept them in the app. - Fixed a critical issue with sync that could cause the Todo Cloud app to get into a cycle that would eat up the battery on a device. We recommend all users update to avoid the problem.

description: Note: Garden Jigsaw Puzzles is designed for tablets and may not be as nice on small phones. This jigsaw puzzle pack contains 40 jigsaws. Indicator function through the phone's gyroscope devices to detect mobile phone's 3D position, simulate mouse control functions, using methods similar to the Wii console. ● Power control: computer power operation performed through a simple button. Contains shutdown, timed shutdown, reboot, reboot timer, lock, sleep, sleep. Support voice control, including shutdown, reboot, lock, sleep, sleep, ex: three seconds to shutdown / reboot, four minutes shutdown / reboot, 5 hours shutdown / reboot, six days shutdown / reboot, and supports automatic locking function if the user leaves the computer automatically unlocked WIFI range, to protect user privacy and data security. ● Entertainment: For Windows Media Player / Classic, TTPlayer, PPS, KKBOX, iTunes, Youtube ... etc., 12 kinds of playback devices operate, including play, pause, adjust volume, on the one next first. ● gadget: Call gadgets computer through simple buttons, such as calculator, notepad, Snipping Tool, Paint ... etc., to improve efficiency.

The leader of SEAL Team 6 uttered, "Geronimo", and the world let out a sigh of relief. The symbol of ultimate evil was no more. "Code Word: Geronimo" is the amazing, moment-by-moment story of the clandestine raid on Osama bin Laden's compound in Abbottabad, Pakistan. Told by military insider and Hollywood consultant, Captain Dale Dye (USMC, Ret.) with Dr. Julia Dye, Ph. D.

L'application ICI TOU.TV permet de profiter de l’offre d'ICI TOU.TV en mobilité. ICI TOU.TV offre le rattrapage et la rediffusion du réseau de Radio-Canada, incluant ICI Radio-Canada Télé, ICI RDI, ICI ARTV et ICI Explora; ainsi que d’autres diffuseurs partenaires francophones: Télé-Québec, TFO, TV5, RTBF, RTS et France Télévision. C’est un lieu de découverte de contenu original et de webséries exclusives. On y retrouve aussi les contenus les plus récents, les émissions les plus populaires et des collections. L’application bêta est gratuite. Elle propose, la navigation par genre et la recherche par mots-clés pour que vous puissiez profiter d’ICI TOU.TV à chaque instant. La fonctionnalité MA LISTE rassemble vos contenus favoris et permet un accès rapide aux vidéos qui vous intéressent. L’application offre également les résumés des épisodes et la description des émissions. Elle permet le partage des contenus sur les réseaux sociaux. Elle annonce les contenus nouvellement arrivés et les retraits imminents. Les contenus sont majoritairement disponibles au Canada uniquement en raison de leurs droits de diffusion. Note: la lecture des vidéos utilise la bande passante liée à votre forfait de cellulaire. Assurez-vous auprès de votre compagnie de téléphone que votre forfait est adapté à l’utilisation de ce type d’application. The application allows you to enjoy HERE TOU.TV supply ICI TOU.TV mobility. HERE TOU.TV offers remedial and redistribution of Radio-Canada, including CBC TV HERE, HERE RDI, ICI and ICI ARTV Explora; and other French broadcast partners: Télé-Québec, TFO, TV5, RTBF, France and RTS TV. It is a place of discovery of original content and exclusive web series. We also find the latest content, the most popular programs and collections. The beta app is free. It offers the kind navigation and search by keywords so that you can enjoy every moment TOU.TV HERE. AD LIST feature brings your favorite content and provides quick access to the videos that interest you. The application also provides episode summaries and descriptions of programs. It allows the sharing of content on social networks. It announces newly arrived content and impending withdrawals. The content is mostly available in Canada only because of their broadcast rights. Note: the video playback uses the bandwidth related to your cellular plan. Check with your telephone company that your package is suitable for the use of this type of application.
release_text: Chers usagers, Les annonces n'empêcheront plus le visionnement du contenu. Cordialement, L'équipe ICI Tou.tv

description: This simple widget displays solar and geomagnetic data from www.spaceweather.com on your home screen. Many thanks to the folks at www.spaceweather.com for making this data available! Tap the widget to open the Solaris Alpha application, www.spaceweather.com, or the NOAA Space Weather Prediction Center home page for more information. When you install the widget onto your phone's home screen, a configuration dialog allows you to select what happens when you tap the widget. To change this preference, remove the widget from the home screen and then add it back to the home screen. Widget icons and labels indicate the following: - The power of the strongest solar flare in the past 24 hours - Current sunspot number - Current 10.7 cm solar flux, in sfu (solar flux units) - Current 3-hour average planetary Kp index (probability of aurora increases with Kp index) - Btotal and Bz interplanetary magnetic field in nano-teslas (probability of aurora increases with south-facing Bz) These values are updated every thirty minutes. Please email me if you encounter problems, or with suggestions to improve the widget - thanks!
release_text: Added 10.7 cm solar flux, interplanetary magnetic field strengths

Bring your inner bus driver out, challenge against time, collect passengers, discover new places and enjoy the view. **NEW ADDED - Tire smoke effect - Damage effect Features: - Massive open world and customer, passanger collection mode - Super HD quality - Realistic bus physics - Giant big world (City, mountains, rocky places, edges, and many others) - Extremely nice bus - Realistic Steering wheel, Gas, Break, Reverse, TC, ESP, ABS simulation - GPS based customer location simulation - Detailed telemetry (Speed, distance, time, gear and collected customers) - Very easy to use controls - Engine sounds, dynamic acceleration and gear change simulation - This game specially designed bus lovers and drivers in a open world with lots of activites and fun ,happy gaming in 2015

This is a plugin for the Torque pro OBD2 application that shows all the data that Torque has access to as well as some other features that some may find useful for OBD debugging. * Quick and easy display of available ECU sensors * OBD PID scanner to quickly map and locate extended PIDs * Simple Telnet server that allows direct connection to the adapter to allow far easier debugging (aimed at developers) The main application - Torque - allows you to connect your android device to your cars engine management, and read various sensors, even retrieve fault codes (DTC) and clear them once fixed. It can post to Twitter, log data, supports themes, and so much more! If you are interested in developing your own plugin then you can find an example app here(which uses AIDL): http://ian-hawkins.com/torquescan.zip Join the Torque forums (click the developer link below) for more information or to ask questions! Note: This plugin needs the full version of Torque

description: Do you love trivia? Test your smarts with aQuiz, a challenging trivia game for your device. Choose one of eleven topics (or random mode), and answer questions with four possible answers. Earn trophies, learn more about each answer (link to Wikipedia), and beat your high score. - 3,000 questions (and you can submit your own) - 11 topics and random mode - 4 game modes for single player - 2 players on a single screen - High scores, Trophies and Stats If you want a good quiz about interesting trivia, then look no further, you've just found it!

Italian Verb Test Pro allows you to test yourself on Italian verb conjugations. You are asked to translate a verb from English to Italian, given the pronoun and tense/mood. You can then either enter the answer or select it from a list of suggestions. The correct answer is then shown and your score updated if you got it right. - Over 200 of the most commonly used verbs - Enter an answer or select it from a list of suggestions - Conjugation tables for all of the verbs used - Fully configurable - you decide which verbs and which tenses/moods are in the test - Questions can be given in English or Italian - No annoying ads See our developer website for a full list of the verbs used. Italian Verb Test Pro will test you on any combination of the following tenses/moods. - Infinitive (Infinito) - Present (Presente) - Present Perfect (Passato Prossimo) - Imperfect (Imperfetto) - Present Subjunctive (Congiuntivo Presente) - Imperfect Subjunctive (Congiuntivo Imperfetto) ***NEW*** - Present Conditional (Condizionale Presente) - Imperative (Imperativo) - Preterit (Passato Remoto) - Future (Futuro Semplice) If you would like a particular verb to be included in a future version of Italian Verb Test Pro then please send us an email. Not quite ready to buy Italian Verb Test Pro? Then give the Lite version a try, it's free and has all of the same features with fewer verbs and tenses. You can always upgrade to the Pro version at a later date.

Tire with gravity engine... Is it fun? No. IT IS SUPER FUN! ***** GraviTire 3D HD is a challenging game that gives you an opportunity to have fun while rolling a tire on up and down a road. The setting of GraviTire 3D HD is an environment where the main attribute is the rode where players roll their tires. While playing the game you gather speed when you roll the tire downhill. Here where the name of the game comes from: when you roll the tire downhill it gathers speed under the influence of gravitation. GraviTire 3D is a racing game that can engage anyone, because everyone likes competition, it is in our nature. ***** F.A.Q. QUESTION: What happens when touching the screen? ANSWER: When touching the screen gravity engine of the tire turns on, that is to say, the tire gets under the influence of surplus gravitation force. RESULT: As a result the tire speed rises if the tire is rolling downhill or declines if the tire goes uphill. CONCLUSION: Hit the gas (touch the screen) only when rolling downhill ! ***** Features: -- One touch gameplay -- The universe is changing every time. Procedural generated level. Even if you play twice the same level, it will not be the same. -- Real-time multiplayer with random users or with your group. Just log in and play. -- If You win the race you can post results to your wall directly from the game.

description: Try this Endless Ninja Quest Game! * The power in one! Ninja vs infinite! How many Levels & Rounds can you survive? Fight back the enemies with your Ninja Stars in this action packed platform game! This is a ninja game like no other, enjoy ENDLESS gaming in this innovative action game. Choose from two awesome game modes! Sunset Survival & Beach Battle! Collect Gold and use it to upgrade your Ninja's stats! Sunset Survival Mode: Fight until the Sun sets! Each Level more and more stronger enemies will appear. This Mode contains a Purple Boss Monster who will appear at Level 5, watch as he jumps over your Ninja Stars and makes quick charges at you! Can you defeat them all? Beach Battle Mode: In this mode you will have to defeat a certain number of Pink Penguins each Round. Be careful though they are a lot stronger than you think! Pink Penguins drop the best loot, every Round they will drop more and more Gold. This is a great mode to stock up on your Gold and really power up your Ninja's stats! Ninja is an endless Survival/Quest Game. Use skill and strategy to defeat your foes and advance to the Next Level or Round. If you’ve enjoyed Epic Ninja please support us with your 5 Star rating!

description: Go locker by Sm_Dev. Photoeditor Rumen Prodanov. *Make sure GO Launcher EX has been installed. Please check out our other apps.

England Traffic has two modes of view, by map or by road list. Map: With a map powered by Google Maps, you can use your location and find incidents and roadworks around you quickly and easily. Red dots signify incidents, with yellow signifying roadworks. Road list: Travelling a long distance and want to check your route for roadworks? The road list makes this easy, simply pick an A-road or a motorway from the list and view all the current incidents and roadworks. Simple In a bad signal area? Map won't load? The road list uses less internet than the map, allowing for faster checking. In fact, all the internet the app uses is when it starts, so even if you go into a bad signal area, you can still view the road list. Widget With a widget, you don't even have to start the app to view the latest* traffic information, you can get it straight from your homescreen. Simply add the widget to your homescreen and it will flick through the incidents on roads around the country, tap one and it will open the app, for you to select it and view more *Widget refreshes every ½ hour, or when the app is opened Note that as the Highways Agency is the source, this app relies solely on them for information. They only publish information on roads they manage, which is the motorway network and major A-roads. I cannot add roads or information, there are no other open sources Feature image is licenced under CC by Wikipedia user "Snowmanradio"
release_text: 1.2 Internal updates 1.1: Added an option to change the marker for both types, simply tap the marker in the settings [9 to choose from] (Thanks to Richard for the idea) Fixed the info window only showing 1.5 lines

description: The present background information publication contains the text of the Criminal Code of 15 July 2011. Criminal law - a system of regulations adopted by the competent public authorities, including norms governing the relations connected with the establishment of the grounds of criminal responsibility and liberation from it, the definition of criminal acts and other relations included in the subject of regulation of criminal law. Criminal Law by modern scholars, it is generally recognized form of expression of the criminal law, derived from the will of society and the justice of the people, not imposed upon him from outside. Criminal law can exist in the form of a single systematic (codified) legal code (the Code), and in the form of individual acts that contain specific criminal law.

Sports Tactics Board This is a tactics board of basketball which can be used in tablet devices. When we practice, sometimes we use a magnetic board in strategic meeting. This application makes it possible at a tablet devices. Of course, you can use this in Smartphone. Operation Red and blue and black icon are likened with a player or a ball. Please use the purple (star) icon for a referee or strategy explanation. If you drag icons in Trace-ON mode, icons make trails. If you drag where no icons, you can draw yellow lines. This is to describe strategies and movement. If you double-tap on a icon or field, you can delete the trails. With multi-touch-enabled devices, you can move icons immediately,and make trails as well. The displayed screen will be saved. The saved image can be seen in the gallery, file manager applications, etc. Menu Screen_Save：The displayed screen will be saved. The saved image can be seen in the gallery, file manager applications, etc. Clear: Leave the players and ball still, delete the all other lines. Reset: Place icons in positions which you choose from below. 　　　　1. The first position (Home Position) 　　　　2. The position saved with the Position_Save feature (Save Position) Trace-ON/OFF: You can choose whether you would use trails. Position_Save: Save where the icons are when selected. Half/Full-Court: A half-Court and a full Court are chosen. Help: Show help ※ Developer doesn't assume the responsibility for damage and the disadvantage of causing it by using this application at all.

"Akylone Racing" is the only game that offers the possibility to Pilot 8 different models of the Prestigious SuperCar "AKYLONE"! Not less than 10 tracks around the world await you! The speed will be your ally, only if you master! The tracks are more and more technical and require an optimal concentration! I suggest you to start with the initiation track to learn to control your "AKYLONE". It's available on the main menu by clicking on the "Help" button. After that, try to get the Gold Cup of the last track! You can select the level of difficulty: Beginner, Expert or Pilot. The time of each race is recorded. Share your score online and try to stay in the world ranking! So you can compete with players around the World! You can see the rankings at any time by clicking on the logo "World High Scores". Incredible speed and steering sensations await you! Have Fun! ••• Game Features ••• • Drive 8 different models of "AKYLONE"! • Total Control of your SuperCar • Full 3D Real Time rendering • 10 different tracks • Incredible arcade physics • Spectacular SFX • Save as much money and Power go up • Customize your "AKYLONE" • Training mode • Realistic sound environment • Original Music by "REVENGE" • Boost Bonus • Select the difficulty level • Select the accelerometer sensibility • Select the Camera: Inside or Outside • Upload your Score and enter in the World Ranking

This app polls a configurable web-page in regularly intervals and checks the content for a keyword (defined as regular expressions). In the settings two entries have to be done: 1. The URL to be parsed (e.g. " https://news.google.de/news/section?pz=1&cf=all&ned=de&topic=t&ict=ln " for the science news) 2. The content to be scanned for as regex, e.g. "Price:[ ]*([0-9]+)" All Matches of the regex are collected and shown in a table. If the Alarm-Button is activated an alarm (notification) appears if the selected content changes. The initial configuration monitors the Nexus 10 page for the price (and the sold-out state). The alarm is initially turned off. For more information see http://andwebmonit.sourceforge.net/
release_text: v0.0.7: fixed problem with large websites in alarm mode v0.0.5: replaced icons with icons from wpclipart.com v0.0.4: check regex and url syntax on settings page, match whole group, if no group one is defined in regex (no parentheses) v0.0.3: translated alarm-settings into english

The most extensive fishing log application available on the market allows you to quickly log your fish, gear, locations and fishing trips for quick and easy access while out on the water. My Fishing Companion is built to take as little time as possible to save your info so you don't have to spend time entering data while out fishing like many other apps do. You also have the ability to enter your data at a later time so you don't have to even stop fishing. Want to help translate the app into your native language? Head on over to Crowdin to contribute: http://crowdin.net/project/myfishingcompanion Enjoying the Lite version of the app? Upgrade to Pro today to unlock all features and limitations. Key Features • View/Save/Edit your Fish, Gear, Locations and Trips • Attach photos, video and audio clips to your data • Mark fish as Favorites for quick access to your lunkers • Export Fish to CSV *Pro Only • Organize your Fish by Fishing Trips • Add locations by map, zip code or current GPS location • Lookup Weather for any location in the world • Customizable Units of Measurement • Moon Phases *Pro Only • Share your data with others • Main Dashboard gives quick access to all your latest data • A simple, clean and easy to use interface • Import/Export your data to SDCARD • Much more! Many more features to come and almost every feature being added to the app now is user requested, so feel free to request features, suggest improvements or report any bugs that you encounter by contacting support@myfishingcompanion.com or go the the "More" option of the App's Main Menu. Stay up to date and request features by joining us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/MyFishingCompanion And Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/fishincompanion And Google Plus: http://plus.google.com/109975657962596983600/ Perfect for fishing any species of fish including bass, trout, salmon, etc., as well as freshwater and saltwater fishing. By downloading this application, you agree to the EULA located at http://myfishingcompanion.com/eula Note: This app uses ACRA for anonymous crash reporting and Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage statistics, used to help improve the app in the areas used the most.

Xord is a simple but addictive and fun word game. It already contains thousands of challenging crosswords, and more are added each and every day. There are also more than 50 free crosswords available which are updated regularly. Once you have downloaded a crossword it will be available to you offline, so that you can enjoy a good crossword even when far away from civilization. Crosswords are available in several different languages and types. At the moment there are three different types of crosswords - Classical crosswords (with hints and solutions in the same language), mathematical crosswords (where the letters have been exchanged for numbers and the answer is calculated, hence helping you improve your math skills) and multilingual translation crosswords (a new and fun way to learn and master a second language where the hints are in one language and the solution is the translation in another). The currently available crosswords languages are Swedish, German, English, Finnish, Danish, Spanish, Math, English/German, English/Japanese, English/Spanish and English/Swedish. The quality of the crosswords is constantly improved by the Xord community where new cross word questions can be added and crosswords ready for publishing can be approved word by word. Helping out in the community will also earn you points which could be converted to the Xord in-app money called xcoins. The crosswords are shown "Swedish-style" (a.k.a "picture crosswords"), meaning that no clue numbers are used, as the clues are contained in the cells which would normally be shaded in other countries. Arrows indicate in which direction the clues have to be answered, vertical or horizontal. The advantage of this is that you can have your focus on the board at all time since the clues and solutions are in the same place which makes it easier for the user. This type of cross words are fast spreading from Northern Europe, not only to the rest of Europe, USA and the rest of America, but also to Asia and Africa. The name Xord comes from "X" as in "cross" and the Swedish word "ord" which means "word", i.e. Xword. Crossword puzzle has for long times been a popular pastime in large parts of the world. One could say that solving a crossword puzzle is much like finding the words of a finished game of wordfeud or scrabble. The only help you have on the way are the hints written for each word on the board. Please help us improve this app by sending us bugs you find, suggested improvements, comments, etc. Please send all this to email: xord@beansys.com Features: * New crosswords every day. * Several different languages. * Innovative crosswords - like math and translation puzzles. * Your game will be auto saved when closed. * Community improved crosswords. * Thousands of available crosswords and constantly increasing. Happy crossing!
release_text: 2.1.0 * You will now be notified when the crossword correctly filled. * Added a crossword information view with some basic statistics. * Translated to German. I have done it myself using my german knowledge from school and with the help from online translation services. Hence, there are probably a lot of language errors. Please let me know how it should be corrected. Help will be rewarded with Xord coins. * A few bug fixes and performance improvements. * All crosswords are now free!!

IBM Connections Meetings is the official app for online meetings for IBM's award-winning Connections platform. IBM Connections Meetings gives you the power to leave your desktop behind and run and attend meetings with colleagues, customers, and business partners from the comfort of your smartphone or tablet from anywhere you happen to be. IBM Connections Meetings is a next-generation universal app designed for the new way to work. Its innovative capabilities allow you to optimize the time you spend in meetings by enhancing your situational awareness prior to, during, and after a meeting. All to help you accelerate your business processes and improve decision making and efficiency. IBM Connections Meetings works with your IBM Sametime 9 infrastructure and features built-in integration with IBM's Connections Cloud family of offerings. Key features: - Calendar integration with IBM Notes and Microsoft Outlook - Secure group chat - Instant polls - Annotations - Private thumbnail document preview - Integration with IBM Connections Social Files including built-in integration with IBM Connections Social Cloud - Continuous-presence audio and video (on-premises) - Softphone

The Microsoft Tag app lets you instantly connect to a whole new world of information and entertainment. This latest version now reads Microsoft Tag barcodes and QR Codes as well as NFC touchpoints for those with NFC-enabled devices. No need to type long URLs or text short codes, simply scan a 2D barcode or tap a touchpoint wherever you see one. Tag recognition technologies transform traditional marketing, such as print advertising, billboards, packaging and LCD displays, into live links that immediately access info, videos and other materials online... no typing required.

description: The Michelin Aircraft Tire App is a comprehensive mobile application for aircraft mechanics, private pilots, airlines, military operators and others who have an interest in aircraft tires. App includes: • Michelin Care and Service Guide • Fitment Guide • Tire Wear Guide • Product Information • Dealer Locator • About Michelin When these individuals need information, the app provides quick and easy access to the Michelin Aircraft Tire Care & Service Manual. Used as a reference guide throughout the global aviation industry, Michelin’s Care & Service Manual provides knowledge on how to effectively maintain aircraft tires, maximize tire life, and reduce total cost of ownership. The app also provides information about Michelin aircraft tires and tubes. It includes a Fitment Guide for determining the correct Michelin products that are approved for each specific airframe. A Tire Wear Guide includes photographs and descriptions of the most common wear conditions for help in troubleshooting. A Dealer Locator includes the names and addresses of dealers where Michelin aircraft tires can be purchased. Additionally, there are numerous helpful brochures that explain the benefits of Michelin aircraft tires and why they are trusted the world over.

description: 集成香港主流報紙(明報,香港電台,東方互動,文匯網,大公報), 人性化的設計, 讓您簡單和快速的閱讀各大大馬報章, 即時掌握最新資訊！ 香港新聞列表: -東方互動 -星島日報 -太陽報 -明報 -文匯網 -香港電台 -大公報 -CNN -BBC -RTHK.HK 香港新聞主要功能： -首創直屏(適合大多數手機)橫屏閱讀(適合Tablet,大屏幕手機Samsung Note使用) -智能清空過期新聞（無需手動清除過期新聞） -左右滑動屏幕閱讀上/下一遍文章 -當前瀏覽新聞指針（返回新聞列表後您可以清楚知道所在位置) -已下載新聞內容圖標顯示 -緩存新聞(節省流量，下次瀏覽更快速) -管理新聞資源 -夜間/白天閱讀模式 -調整新聞字體大小 -收藏新聞 -分享新聞 -設置圖片顯示(節省流量) Keywords: 明報 星島日報 太陽報 香港電台 東方互動 文匯網 大公報 香港新聞 財經 香港報章 香港新闻 Hong Kong News CNN BBC RTHK.HK Integrated mainstream newspapers in Hong Kong (Ming Pao, Radio Television Hong Kong, the Oriental interaction, Wenhui network, Ta Kung Pao), user-friendly design, allowing you to easily and quickly read the major newspapers in Malaysia, immediately grasp the latest information! Hong Kong news list: - Oriental Interactive - Sing Tao Daily - The Sun - Ming Pao - Wenhui Network - Radio Television Hong Kong - Ta Kung Pao -CNN -BBC -RTHK.HK Hong Kong News main functions: - First straight screen (for most phones) horizontal screen reading (for Tablet, the use of large-screen mobile phone Samsung Note) - Intelligent Empty expired News (no need to manually remove outdated news) - Sliding around on the screen reading / under article again - Currently browsing News Pointer (Back to News list after you know the location) - Downloaded News Content icon display - Cache news (save traffic, the next faster browsing) - Resource Management News - Night / day reading mode - Adjust font size News - Favorites News - Share news - Set Picture Show (save traffic) Keywords: Ming Pao, Sing Tao Daily Sun Wenhui interactive network Radio Television Hong Kong Ta Kung Pao, Hong Kong Oriental Financial News newspaper Hong Kong News Hong Kong News CNN BBC RTHK.HK
A must-have for every fan of the black forest of Germany! Features: -Cuckoo sings every hour and half an hour -realistic clockwork with weights and chains -clock changes design during daytime

This app is a simple simulator on mobile for 2D wind tunnel. The app simulates the flow of air around objects of arbitrary shape placed in the wind blowing from left to right. Air is treated as incompressible viscous fluid in the simulation. After drawing objects in [Geometry] in Menu, go to [Simulation]. You will see the flow developing with the passage of time for the default parameters. If necessary, it is possible to interactively change the shape of objects and parameters at any time. Have fun. Neymar want to fly across from one balloon to next one. Please help Neymar to Score his goals. Jump through the balls in the Stadium and get as Goals as you can to beat your highscore. This game will give you a lot of hours of fun and entertainment everywhere. Just download it now. It's free!! Please download and if you like it please rate us and leave your feedback and comments. Neymar da Silva Santos Ju'nior ; born 5 February 1992, commonly known as Neymar, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for La Liga club FC Barcelona and the Brazilian national team, as a forward or winger. Features: - Free 100% - easy to use! - Do not impact battery lifetime! - Doesn't require Internet connection! - Realistic sounds and stunning graphics. - Very easy and responsive game controls. - No viruses in this application! Thanks for trying Neymar Boy. #####DOWNLOAD NEYMAR BOY APP NOW ###### FUN AND ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY!

The long awaited hit now on Google Play! Join the party! :) TOXIC ALERT! A deadly genetically modified rain cloud of fruit dissolving vapour is heading for the orange capital of the world! WANTED! A fruit loving, natural-ingredient pioneering hero! WHEN? Now! Can you ‘orange’ it? MISSION! Drag the various objects at your disposal to create barriers that will protect the oranges from the acid rain. Use your skill and ingenuity to achieve the maximum population survival rate. Vitamin ‘C’ollateral damage is not an option. REWARD? Adoring shouts and cheers from the small, orange, spherical guys and their undying love. Cover Orange is an exciting puzzle game suitable for all ages. It combines realistic game physics, enduring levels, vibrant colours and laugh out loud animations. It’s time to pump up the juice in a game made from pure orange concentrate! **PRESS REVIEWS** CNET: "Cover Orange: Best game since Cut the Rope?" ".. instantly accessible, wholly addictive, and thoroughly entertaining--just like Angry Birds and Cut the Rope." IGN: "Cover Orange is just what an iPhone game should be: a fun concept with simple touch screen controls and sharp graphics. If you're looking for your next portable addiction, it's got your bases covered." TouchArcade: "I've definitely felt that "ok, just one more level" draw that a clever puzzler will inspire, making it tough to walk away from" SlidetoPlay: "Cover Orange HD got the creative juices flowing."
